187b4('bum): pa nyid dang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / 
187b5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa
187b6('bum): 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs
187b7('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sos yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcoM
187b8('bum): dang na gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gang ji snyed shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du 'dus pa de dag kyang bzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// grag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid
188a1('bum): la bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ji ltar shes par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe
188a2('bum): yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyinang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
188a3('bum): pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong po nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas
188a4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong
188a5('bum): pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo de nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dranapa
188a6('bum): nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stabs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yin
188a7('bum): lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gta na bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i/ 
188a8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ma
188a9('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad po 'di dag dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa dag
188b1('bum): bslab pa mdzad kyis/ bdag cag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o// 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni bdag cag gi stond pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhan tshad myed pa'i bar du yang
188b2('bum): bdag cag gi stond pa ste/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstand par dka'o// rang sangs rgyas dang / dgra bcom pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa dang / rgyun tu/ 
188b3('bum): zhugs pa rnams kyis bstand pa yang 'di yin te/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la slob slob pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob slob pa
188b4('bum): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob slob pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pa slob slob pa dang / tshul khridams kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob slob pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
188b5('bum): phyind pa la slob slob pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang phyi stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob sla ba pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid
188b6('bum): la slob slob pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la sleb slob pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa / 
188b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
188b8('bum): stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spob slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spob slob pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sri
189a1('bum): slob pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / yang dag byar spong ba rnams la slob slob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / dbang po rnams la slob slob pa
189a2('bum): dang / stobs rnams la slob slob pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob slob pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la slob slob pa
189a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams la slob slob pa dang / tshang myong po rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzug myed pa snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / mthar kyis gnas/ 
189a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa la slob slob pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / 
189a5('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams la slob slob pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la slob slob pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la slo/ ba slob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / so so// 
189a6('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / byams pa chen po la slob sa ba pa dang / snying rje chen po la slob slob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob slob pa dang / thams cad shes/ 
189a7('bum): pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob slob pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la slob slob pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang
189a8('bum): dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis kyang pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// pha rol tu phyind to// pha rol tu phyind par 'gyur ro/ zhes bya bar
189b1('bum): shes par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs kyang rung / dri bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pa ro la tusbyin
189b2('bum): pa 'di nyid la nyan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gri stso
189b3('bum): bar gi rten yin no// de dag ni bams rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bsam rnyan gi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ba sems/ 
189b4('bum): dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i b.ragi rten yin no// de dag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka brtson 'grus
189b5('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub la sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin
189b6('bum): no/ de dag gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
189b7('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka tshul khrims
189b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis sbyin
190a1('bum): pa'i pha rol du phyin pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ keny+tsa shig sbyin pa'i pha rolang du phyin pa 'di ni nan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thas
190a2('bum): cad kyi rten yin te/ sku dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis nang stong pa nyid la rten por bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas pa
190a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis phyi stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi/ 
190a4('bum): ka phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gri skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag
190a5('bum): gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la brten par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgya/ sa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi
190a6('bum): rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yi na no// de dag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / 
190a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gis chen po stong pa nyid la brtan par bya sted/ de ci'i phyir zhe
190a8('bum): na ke'u shig chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thas cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi ste dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis don dam
190b1('bum): slong bzhing brtan pa byor zhen/ na don sa pa spong ba'i rdzu pa nga ngas sa rnam sa nu sems dang bums dang chen po bams sadag nyid 'a
190b2('bum): yin gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtan par byaste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ ke'u ga~M ka 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'drin nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas / byang chub sems dpa'i sems na
190b3('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yon gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brten par byaste nA de ci'i phyir zhe na/ keT shi ka dus ma byas stong ba nyid 'didi
190b4('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems ngo pa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye dgu'i rab gi rten yin no// de dag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
190b5('bum): la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dang sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lce dang
190b6('bum): myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
190b7('bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na ta ke'u shi ka dor
190b8('bum): bskyed pa snang pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad gi rten yin te/ lta dang myi dang lha ma yin go skye dgu'i bar gri rten yin no// de dag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni
191a1('bum): bdun par skye kyi phyir zhen/ ke ka nga bzhin yang pa nyid ni na sa da rangasangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang chen po thams ca kyinyin mid te/ su dang nga sgyum yid na
191a2('bum): dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis ces thams cad stong pa nyid sa gartan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir ne na ste mug ga tsas thams par stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
191a3('bum): thams cad kyi rten te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid lnga brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang
191a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thamasacad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bdag rten yin no// de dag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la brtan
191a5('bum): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma
191a6('bum): yin gi 'jig rten skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
191a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar garten yin no// de dag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u she ka ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
191a8('bum): 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gis skye dgu'i bar garten yin no// de dag gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
191b1('bum): brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi kA dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang sngam
191b2('bum): yin gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
191b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i b.ro gi rten yin no// de dag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka yang
191b4('bum): dag par spong ba rnams 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad gi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis
191b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos
191b6('bum): cing gi rten pa yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar ga rten yi na no// de dag gis dbang po rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka dbang po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang
191b7('bum): sbyangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis stobs rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
191b8('bum): kai'u shi ka stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad gi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis byang chub
192a1('bum): gakyisan lag nams pa brtan par smraste/ 'i byor zhen/ shig byang chub kyi yan lag 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dab chen po thams ca kyi
192a2('bum): in tA g+hA dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtan par bya ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di
192a3('bum): ngag na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi sbyo dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// dedag gis 'phags pa'i ban pa rnams
192a4('bum): la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te
192a5('bum): lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye dgu'i bar gyi rten yin no// de dag gi sa bsam gtan rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka bsam gtan 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
192a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis tshad myed pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka tshad
192a7('bum): myong pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis gzugs myed pa'i
192a8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192b1('bum): thams ca kyi rten yi te/ skad kyi dang snyam yin gyi ste dgu'i ba gi rten smin/ dedag gis rnam pa seM ba rnamasas ban pa ste/ dus kyi shen// sa shi kAnam pa da ni
192b2('bum): da byang sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha rang myi dang lA ma yin gi skye dgu'i bdag rten yin no// de dag gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
192b3('bum): rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192b4('bum): thams cad kyi rkyen yin te/ lnga dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa
192b5('bum): brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed dasmond pa myed pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs
192b6('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis mngon par shes pa rnas
192b7('bum): la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka mngon par shes pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lham
192b8('bum): yin gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtand par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shika ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
193a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang mi dang nyalha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
193a2('bum): ke'u shi ka gzungs kyi sgo 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye dgu'i par gi rten yin no// de
193a3('bum): ngag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u she ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs 'di dag ni nyan thos pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
193a4('bum): chen po thams cad gi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skyo dgu'i bar nga gi brten yin no// de dag gis myi 'jigs pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyin zhe na/ ke'u shi ka myi 'jigs pa 'di dag ni nyan
193a5('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gyi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
193a6('bum): la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka so so yang dag par rig po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha/ 
193a7('bum): ma yin dang gi skyi dgu'i b.rag rten yin no// de dag gis snying rje chen po la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na dko'u shi ka chen po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
193a8('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi ske dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi chos
193b1('bum): ma 'dres pa 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis thams cad shes pa nyid
193b2('bum): la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka thams cad shes pa nyid 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi skye
193b3('bum): dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis lam gi rnam pa she pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
193b4('bum): chen po thams cad kyi rten yin te/ lha dang myi dang lha ma yin gi ske dgu'i bar gi rten yin no// de dag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka rnam pa thams cad
193b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi chen yin te/ lha dang myi myi dang lha ma yin dang gi skye dgu'i bar gi rten yin na/ 
193b6('bum): bam po / ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de/ 
193b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis/ mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshadaHtsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phye ba bya ste/ de ltar nam mtsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spongs pa dang / 
193b8('bum): lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi nam za dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi si ling snyan ma pa pos mi/ 
194a1('bum): gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ pu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol da pa/ 
194a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris shing 'dzind pa dang / 
194a3('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la yang rgya cher ston cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da kyi sems dang myi bral ba grong du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos
194a4('bum): dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phud dud du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ces
194a5('bum): mang du 'phel lo/ ke'u shi ka mchod rten gcig lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka gal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de bzhin ge/ shegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'dzam
194a6('bum): bu gling 'di rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la rgyar dpag tshad phyed pas yongs su bkang ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du lha rdzas kyi me tog drang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / 
194a7('bum): la rdzas kyi bag pa dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos dang / lha rdzas kyi nam mtha dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas
194a8('bum): kyi sil snyan mang pos rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phung dud du byas/ mchod par byas na// ke'u shi ka de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byi ning
194b1('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris
194b2('bum): shing 'jand pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang myi bral la/ gong du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / 
194b3('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu rung du byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams ces mang du 'phel
194b4('bum): lo ta ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka gal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan

194b8('bum): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lam/ rgya byind kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs
195a1('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / 
195a2('bum): dris shing me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na brda' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/ mchod par byed na/ bsod nams
195a3('bum): ches mang du 'phel lo// ke'u shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rtend gis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te regs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ 
195a4('bum): gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir stong gi 'jig rtenang gi khams byung bu 'di rin po che sna bdun la sa byas bya'i mchod rten mapang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad

195b3('bum): blta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka gal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i phyir/ 'jig gten gi khams 'bring po stong gnyis

196b1('bum): gis yongs su bkang ba lta zhog gi ke'u shi ka stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nang gi khams na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag las sems can re res de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/

196b5('bum): dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / te tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang ma bral bar bya ste/ de me tog dang / 'phreng / 
196b6('bum): ba dang spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdin dang / si le snyun sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu dud du byas/ mchod par byas na/ 
196b7('bum): nyid bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de de lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rim 'gror bgyis
196b8('bum): ba dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / pu dung du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis pas ni/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
197a1('bum): rim gror bgyis pa dang / bkur stir bgyis pa dang / phu dung du bgyis pa dang / mchod par bgyis par 'gyur ro// shar daphyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed/ 
197a2('bum): cig mchis pa de dag las/ sems can re ris kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slang du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'bang du pa gi tshang cam la/ rgyar dpag tshang bya
197a3('bum): sha stag bgyis te de dag la bskal pa 'am/ bskal ba'i lhag mar/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha
197a4('bum): rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi bad na dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur sIr bgyis/ pu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / lho phyogs kyi
197a5('bum): 'jig rtend ki khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can/ ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhi/ na gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin
197a6('bum): po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten dpag du dpag tshad tsam/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la skal pa 'am skal dpa 'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi
197a7('bum): spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lnga rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan dang / sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ 
197a8('bum): pu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las/ sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
197b1('bum): ngan las 'das pas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten dpag tu dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad myed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am skal pa'i lhag mar/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / 
197b2('bum): lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshog
197b3('bum): kyis rim 'gror bgyis bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyid pa dang / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res
197b4('bum): kyang ta de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod dpa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la
197b5('bum): bskal pa'am/ bskalang pa'i lhag mar lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lu rjes kyi sras dang / lha rdzas kyi thug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi nabaza' dang / lhardzas kyi
197b6('bum): gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi 'dran dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis bkur stiR+sha/ phu dung du ba bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / byang shAr kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'dzi
197b7('bum): rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mnad
197b8('bum): rten 'bang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad tsam sha stag bgyis te de dge la skal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar lta rdzas kyi me tog dang / lca rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi
198a1('bum): phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gor bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / shar
198a2('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ge'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las

198a4('bum): kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par

198a8('bum): tshogs kyis rim 'grer bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phud dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / nub byad kyi phyogs kyi mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag
198a9('bum): las sems can re res kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod pa'i slad du/ rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis ste/ 
198b1('bum): de dag la bskal pa 'am skal pa'i lhag mar/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan
198b2('bum): dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna sna tshogs kyis rim 'gor bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pa dang / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye

198b5('bum): ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas/ kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan dang / lha rdzas kyi sil// snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du/

198b7('bum): nas mchod pa'i slad du rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i mchod rtend 'phang du dpag tshad tsam la/ rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa sha stag bgyis te/ de dag la bskal pa 'am skal pa'i lhag mar/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng

198b9('bum): rim 'gror bgyis/ bkur stir bgyis/ phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na// bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar dgongs pa de'i slad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams mang du 'phel ba lags samya/ bcom
199a1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka mang ngo // brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'ad bris shing 'dzin pa dang
199a2('bum): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid cing de dag la mye tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis
199a3('bum): bkur stir bgyis phu dud du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phelo// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i nang du dge bI chos thams cad 'dus te/ 'di ltar dge ba
199a4('bum): bcu'i las kyi la rjes dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
199a5('bum): ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi/ dapha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stodapa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi na nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong/ 
199a6('bum): banyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong ba nyid dus byas snang pa nyid dang / 'dus pa byas snang pa nyid dang // sa 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tham myed pa snying pa nyid dang / 
199a7('bum): byed pa sang pa ny-id dang / rang ba'i nablang ba sa nga / mad su nga/ rgya gyigs pasas nyid // ngam brgyad pa grang shi nga/ nga ba cid dang / ngas pa myed
199a8('bum): stong pa nyid nga dran panye bar bdag pa nas dang / yang dag par sna mas dang / rdzu 'phrul gan dang / dbang pa rnams dang / skabs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'a sa pas
199a9('bum): yang lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang sman pa myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bde pa dang / bsdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam bzhi dang mngon pa
199b1('bum): drug dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
199b2('bum): sa so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gi rna bar shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
199b3('bum): nyid kyang 'dus so// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa ste/ de la skabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes
199b4('bum): nad kyis chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyind par gyur to// phyi nad to phyind par gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u bcu dag pa'o// / 
199b5('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka/ de de bzhin ni de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi
199b6('bum): bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gong
199b7('bum): du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal 'tshan dang / ba dan dang sal snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas/ phu drung du byas/ mchod pa
199b8('bum): byas na/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad myed grangs myed/ bsam du myed par 'phel lo// deci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ de bzhin
200a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
200a2('bum): las byung ba'i ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byung ba ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol
200a3('bum): tu phyind pa las byung ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni phyi stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byir
200a4('bum): nang stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byung ba na chen dpa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni ngon ngom pa

200a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni thog ma dang ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni
200a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni myi dmyigs
200a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni dngos po myong ba'i/ 
200b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni rdzu 'phrul gi
200b2('bum): rkang pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni dbang po rnamaso// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni stobs rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// shes rab
200b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni bsam gtan ging
200b4('bum): rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ tshad myed pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni/ gzu gas myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

200b6('bum): sna stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'o/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa las byung ba ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
200b7('bum): pa las byung ba ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa las byung ba'i ni/ myi 'jigs pa rnams so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
200b8('bum): las byung ba'i sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rdo mang tu phyind pa las/ byung ba ni byams pa chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni snying rje chen po'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
201a1('bum): las byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnamaso// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni thams cad shes pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid/

201a4('bum): la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bris te/ glegs bam du byas te/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / mye tog dang 'phreng ba dang

201a6('bum): mngon par 'du byas pa 'di la bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba/ snga mas rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang / brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi
201a7('bum): cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang bgrangs pa dang / dper yang nye bar mya 'gro'o// rgyur yang myi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke ru shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa na 'di dza srid du/ 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa de srid du sangs
201a8('bum): rgyas dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro// chos dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro// dge 'dun dkon mchog nub par myi 'gyur ro// de'i slad du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ bas
201b1('bum): gtan bzhi pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rjes 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa/

201b5('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung / par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
201b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnon/ ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rab myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ro// rang bzhin stong pa

201b8('bum): bskyed pa gad pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngan tang rung ba nyid 'dug ca du rung bar 'gyur ro// dngas paskyed par ra ba dang mang banyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dra panye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du
202a1('bum): ga par 'gyur ro/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gnang ba nas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ stobs rnams 'jig rten du
202a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ 'jigs pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyu
202a3('bum): par tha rad pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung
202a4('bum): bar 'gyur rlo/ tIng nge 'dzin rnams 'jug rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams
202a5('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ro// byams pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
202a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lam ni rnam par shes pa nyid 'dzag rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad
202a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de srid du rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthog
202a8('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen pani'i ris kyi lha rnams/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sum bcu na gsum gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung na bar 'gyur ro// ma che ma'i lha rnams 'jig rten du
202b1('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' ldan gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phrul dga' lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs ras tu
202b2('bum): lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs lha nye phan gi lce rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'a 'gyur ro// tshangs chen gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'bru
202b3('bum): bar 'gyur ro// sdang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
202b4('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar gyur ro// chung dge'i lha rnams 'jog rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshang myang dge'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dge
202b5('bum): rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// che ba'i lha rnam sa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten
202b6('bum): ru 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shin
202b7('bum): tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'og myon gi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i lha rnams
202b8('bum): 'jig rten du 'brum nga bar 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnams dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i bras bu rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
203a1('bum): rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ bla na myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yod do// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod do// 
203a2('bum): sems can yongs su smin pa yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yod do// de nas stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnas
203a3('bum): dang / mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang / dga' ldan gi lha rnams dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun
203a4('bum): 'khor gi lha rnams dang / tshangs chen gi lha rnams dang / snang ba'i lha rnams dang / chung snang gi lha rnams dang / tshad myeng snang ba'i lha rnams dang / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams dang / dge ba'i lha rnams dang / 
203a5('bum): chung dge' lha rnams dang / tshad myed dge'i lha rnams dang / da/ ge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / che ba'i lha rnams dang / nung che'ilha rnams dang / tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba'i lha nas
203a6('bum): dang / mche ba'i lha rnams dang / myi gdung ba'i lha rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams dang / gyanam snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og myin gi lha gang ji skad yang pa de dag la lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gis smras pa/ 
203a7('bum): grangs pa ga shes pa mang tsu 'ang zus no// groms pa dgags pa rgya mdu ldan pa yang bya/ grags pa dag shes ra kyi ma mal du byed pa klag par byang/ grangs bdag gis pa
203a8('bum): pa kun nub par bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nul bzhin du yid la bya'o// grogs po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul pa ni
203b1('bum): bu yid la byas pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chul rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul rgyun chad par myi 'gyur ro/ dge 'dun gi tshul chun gyi 'chad par 'gyur ro/ grogs pa dag sangs rgyas kyi nul rgyan ma chang bas/ grogs ca
203b2('bum): dgams kyi nul rgyun macad de/ grags pa dgang ge 'dun gargyal rgyun mchad na/ sbyin pa'i pha ro lang tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chug rnams kyi pa yang tu byin pa 'jig rten du 'phru
203b3('bum): la ma ro tu phyiring pa 'jog rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu tsho/ shes rab tu ma rnam
203b4('bum): byinang pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig rjen du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// blo stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stod pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid
203b5('bum): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ don de pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten
203b6('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'ji ga rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
203b7('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ chos thams cad/ stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar
203b8('bum): 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po myeng pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// don
204a1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par
204a2('bum): spong ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi
204a3('bum): yan lag rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam
204a4('bum): gtan rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rnam par tha ra pa rnaMs
204a5('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa/ nyer 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// rnam da par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
204a6('bum): smon pa myed pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa ni mas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
204a7('bum): 'jig rten du/ 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa
204a8('bum): rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sos byams bachen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ca
204b1('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyunang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras/ 
204b2('bum): bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten du/ 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang byang chub 'jig rten du/ 'byung bar
204b3('bum): 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po/ brgya byin la bka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka/ khyod
204b4('bum): kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa 'di/ bzung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par/ gyis na dag/ ke'u shi ka/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rold tu
204b5('bum): phyind pa 'di/ tshul bzhin du/ yid la gyis shig/ de/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka/ nam lha ma yin rnam sa/ 'di snyam du sems shing / sum bcu rtsa gsum
204b6('bum): gyi lha rnams/ dang / tshams lnga la bsngal lo// snyam na/ de'i tshe/ khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyind pa 'di yid kyis/ soms la/ kha ton gyis
204b7('bum): shig/ tshul bzhin du/ yid la gyis shig dang / des/ lha ma yin gi/ bsam pa de dag/ phyir nub par 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa de dag spobs
204b8('bum): shing / rnam par 'phel/ bar gyi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dang / lha'i/ bu mo/ gang dag/ 'chi 'phor/ ba
205a1('bum): nam bdag cag ngan song du skye bar mthong na yang / ke'u shi ka khyod kyis de dag gi mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha don du gyis shig de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa thos pa'i dge ba
205a2('bum): rtsa ba dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mos pas lha'i gnas de nyid du skye bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di thos pa ni de ltar don dang ldan pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
205a3('bum): bu mo 'am gang su yang rung ste/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'a/ 
205a4('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba
205a5('bum): de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la bslabs nas// phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying su yongs su mya nga na las 'das/ ma byon pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
205a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bca sa pa ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
205a7('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
205a8('bum): skyong ba de dag thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyis
205b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di'i nang du nyan thos kyi chos sam rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang rung ste/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad 'dus so// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ 
205b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags chen mo'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na myed pa'i rigs sngags/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes ra
205b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rigs sngags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad sgrub po/ 
205b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs sngags chen mo'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
205b5('bum): 'di ni bla na myed pa'i rigs sngagaso// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rigs sA/ gso/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhi
205b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang rigs sngags 'di la rten de te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
205b7('bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de thams cad kyang rigs sngags 'di la brten/ 
205b8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyirar zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs sngags 'di yod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bsam
206a1('bum): bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sbyin gyi/ 
206a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin// 
206a3('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin// nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
206a4('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yi/ na/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid da 'jig rten na yod pa yin 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa ste
206a5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed/ pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig
206a6('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa ji nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na
206a7('bum): yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig
206a8('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin
206b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pasti
206b2('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten nu yod pa yin/ 
206b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ so so yang dag pa/ 
206b4('bum): rig pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ byams pa chen po 'jig rten na yo da pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas da kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi dbyings na/ 
206b5('bum): 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' 'jig rten na yod pa yin// de bzhin nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid 'dzi ga rten na yod pa yin/ gzhan ma yin pa 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ 
206b6('bum): chos nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos kyi gnas nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ chos skyon myed pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ myig lnga 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin
206b7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin/ rang byang chub 'jig rten na yin pa yin/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'dzin
206b8('bum): rten na yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'jig rten na yod pa yin// / shes rab bam po
207a1('bum): ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' yod na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam tshwa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdag
207a2('bum): su yod pa yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten na gangag su yod pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten ma gdags su yod/ 
207a3('bum): pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin// 
207a4('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin pa nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid
207a5('bum): 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gang gas su yod pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags/ yod pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin// 
207a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten
207a7('bum): na gdag su yod pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ 
207a8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
207b1('bum): 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su ga yod pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'jig
207b2('bum): rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dbang po rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ sto/ 
207b3('bum): rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
207b4('bum): rnams 'jig rten na gdegasu yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
207b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'jig rten na gdag su yo// da pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa/ yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ 
207b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ myi 'jigs pa rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin// 
207b7('bum): byams pa chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ snying rje chen po 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ thams cad shes pa nyid 'jig
207b8('bum): rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ lam gi rnam par shes pa nyid 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten na gangag su yod pa yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ 
208a1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'gro rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ dgra bcom pa 'jig rten na gdag su yod pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas 'jig rten na/ 
208a2('bum): gdags su yod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten na gdags su yod pa yin/ ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na rtsa dang rgyu skar/ 
208a3('bum): dang skar ma gdags su yod do// ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yod na/ dge ba'i spyod pa dang yang dag pa'i spyod pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang gzugs
208a4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / nga rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa de nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang 'phags po'i bden pa/ 
208a5('bum): dang rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms/ par 'jug pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang / stobs bcu dang myi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang sangs
208a6('bum): kyithos pa sa pa ni brtsas pa dgags su yod// slob po dang kyi ma pa dang / nya sa da ma sangs rgyas kyi m+b+ha sgyur dang / ska mo thams cad kying gdag su mdang/ de bzhin gshegs par sa pa
208a7('bum): yang dag par thegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten na mang bar 'gyur ro/ gang ni nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du ma byung bda'i can mang dang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can sa
208a8('bum): 'dzi pa nga/ sto kyi yid chub sems pa'i sems da can pas sa rgya ni ny-i sa kyi tshig la ngasas rgyas kyi rig pa mig pa
208b1('bum): rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa'i pha ro la tu phan pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi ga
208b2('bum): la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang phyi stong pa nyid la spyod
208b3('bum): ba dang / byi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas song ba nyid pa
208b4('bum): spyod pa dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa ste rapa nyid la spyod pa dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang chos thas
208b5('bum): cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la/ spyod pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la
208b6('bum): spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / 
208b7('bum): dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / 
208b8('bum): sa rnams sa byu / gajug pa myed mapa mi chug parnams sa kya rnam pas kyi 'ang / ya kyis ma
209a1('bum): 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang gzungs
209a2('bum): kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang sangs rgyas
209a3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang nyan thos kyi sar myi ltung ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon du mi byed pa dang / sems can yong su smin par byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed pa dang ma thun
209a4('bum): sum tshogs pa yongasu 'dzin pa dang / sems phun sum tshogs pa dasu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs da su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa
209a5('bum): yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rje su thob parabyed pa'i thabs mkhas pa de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba las byung bar rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs
209a6('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni/ tshe 'di'i yan tan 'di dag dang tshe rabs gzhan gis/ 
209a7('bum): tan 'di dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid/ 
209a8('bum): dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de/ tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dang ldan par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u sho ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
209b1('bum): 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de sngon gi las gi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par dug gis dus byed par myi 'gyu ro// mtshon gyis dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// 
209b2('bum): mes dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// chus dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// nang brgyad rtsa gcig gi bar gis dus byed par myi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang bu nas gnong par bya ba nog byung ba las gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bumang/ 
209b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa 'di kha don du byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de la glags tshol ba de dag gis glags myi rnyid/ rgyal po'i bu dang rgyal po'i blon po'i chen po dag kyang gtam 'dri ba dang gtam bya bar sems shing dag
209b4('bum): bar bya bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyi gzi brjid dang mthus de ltar sems so// gal to/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209b5('bum): 'di kha don du byed cing / rgyal po'i pho brang du song na/ de rgyal po'i bu ra rgyal po'i blon po chen po dag kyang dga' ba'i tshig gis gtam la// dri ba dang gtam bya bar sems shing dga' bar bya bar sems pa
209b6('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems nye sa ra gzhag snying rje'i sems dang dga' ba'i sems dang btang snyom
209b7('bum): kyi sems nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'om rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni ma
209b8('bum): 'di'i yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur/ ke'u shi ka tshe rabs gzhan gi yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur te bsam gtan bzhi dang // 
210a1('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams
210a2('bum): dang stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang lam rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad myed pa rnams dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa rnas dang / 
210a3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin
210a4('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// de sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam gi
210a5('bum): dbang ma gtogs par nam yang sems can dmyal bar myi skye/ byol/ song gi skye gnas su myi skye/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mi skye'o// de nas yang yan lag nyams pa can du myi 'gyur/ nam yang dbul po'i rig
210a6('bum): su myi skye/ smyig ma mkhan gi rigs su myi skye/ spyi sha can gi rigs sam/ 'gar ba 'am phyag dar ba 'am/ shan pa'am phag gsod pa'i rigs sam/ dmigs rigs su myi skye/ rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par myi ched
210a7('bum): po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par 'gyur/ 'jig rten gi khams gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i 'jig rten gi khams de dag tu rdzus shing skye bar 'gyur te/ nam yang byang chub sems
210a8('bum): dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// de 'dod na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la lta ba dang phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang chos nyan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ 
210b1('bum): de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sems can rnams kyang yongs su sbyin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yon tan 'di dag
210b2('bum): phun sum tshogs par 'dod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya klag par bya kun chub par bya/ tshul bzhin du yid la bya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar bya ste/ de dag ni bla na
210b3('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du che 'di'i yon tan dang / tshe rabs gzhan gi yon tan de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba las/ 
210b4('bum): le'u nyi shu pa'o / de nas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba glegs lta ba'i bsam pa can brgya tsam zhig bcom ldan 'das ga
210b5('bum): ba der logs su dong ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur da te/ mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba brgya po glags lta ba'i bsam pa can 'di dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
210b6('bum): dong na/ de la bdag gis ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa brjod pas mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du dong na/ bar chad med par myi 'gyur bar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las shre
210b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las ji snyed cig bzung ba de dag kha don du bya'o snyam nas/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji snyed bzung ba de dag kha rnon du brjod do// de nas mu ste/ 
210b8('bum): can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba de dag rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su skor ba byas nas lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems dpar gyur te/ de ltar mu
211a1('bum): stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba de dag gis kyang rgyang ring po ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogasu skor ba byas te// lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong na/ de ci'i rgyu zhig snyam pa dang de nas bcom
211a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs kyis thug su chud nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
211a3('bum): 'di yang dag par bsams pas de'i phyir mu stegs can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag rgyang po ring po ring po nas nga la g.yas phyogasu bkor ba byas te/ lam de nyid dang sgo de nyid nas phyir dong ba yin no sha ra dwa ti'i bu mu ste/ 
211a4('bum): can gzhan dang kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag las 'ga' tsam la yang dkar po'i sems dang ldan pa ma mthong ste/ mu stegs can gzhan dang / kun tu rgyu ba 'di dag thams cad ni gnod par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa
211a5('bum): glags lta ba'i bsam pa can sha stag ste/ 'khor 'dir 'ong bar se mas pa sha stag kyang sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas ni 'jig rten lha dang bca sa pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang dge sbyong dang bram ze/ 
211a6('bum): bcas pa'i skye dgu'i nang na gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ zhe sdang ba'i sems dang glags lta ba'i bsam pas nye bar 'gro bar ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na sha ra dwa ti'i bu
211a7('bum): de ni 'di ltar stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mche ma dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu dang tshangs ris kyi
211a8('bum): lha dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang snang ba dang chung snang dang tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang ba dang dge ba dang chung dge dang tshad med dge ba dang chung dge dang tshad myed dge ba dang dge rgyas dang / 
211b1('bum): ba dang / chung che dang tshad med che ba dang 'bras bu che ba dang mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang shin tu mthong ba dang gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gi lha gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ji snyed cig yod pa dang / 
211b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i sha stag gi// 
211b3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang / 
211b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang ga nod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / 
211b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyi/ ra zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams
211b6('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan tho sa kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyargyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang lha dang klu dang /
