211b7('bum): gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yong su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar de dag thas / 
211b8('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba sha stag go// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang rang
212a1('bum): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig
212a2('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba sha stag go// byang phyogs kyi
212a3('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
212a4('bum): po dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongasu
212a5('bum): bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba sha stag go// byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
212a6('bum): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / 
212a7('bum): lha ma yi ni dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'che chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongasu bzung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
212a8('bum): tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
212b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ 
212b2('bum): yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
212b3('bum): 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci 'am lto 'phye chen po gang ji
212b4('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di yongasu bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba sha stag go// nub byang gyi phyogs 'tshams
212b5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgya sa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig/ bzhugs pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
212b6('bum): dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams ca da kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongasu bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
212b7('bum): 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba sha stag go// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji
212b8('bum): snyid cig bzhugs pa dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa
213a1('bum): jug ngag thams cad kyis kyang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir ro zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa las byung ba sha stag go// steng gi phyogs kyi 'dzag
213a2('bum): rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / lha dang klu dang gnod
213a3('bum): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ji dang / lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yongs su bzung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
213a4('bum): ltar de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba yang sha stag go// de nas bdud sdig to can 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
213a5('bum): 'khor bzhi po 'di dag kyang mngon tu gyur/ 'dod pa la spyod pa dang / gzugs la spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag kyang / mngon du gyu ra pa las 'dir ni gdon myi za bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
213a6('bum): pa rnams zla byed pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa byang chub tu/ lung stor par 'gyur tsas/ des bdag gas bcom ldan 'das gal ba dengs / bar chang bya' smras nas/ bdud sdig to can gos dpung ga tshig
213a7('bum): yan lag bzhi 'a mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'gro 'dod par gyu ra pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems dpar gyur to// kye ma bdud brta sdig tocan 'di dpung gi tshogs yan lag
213a8('bum): ban pa mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das gabad pa der 'gro bar 'dod la/ bdud sdig to can gi dpung ga tshogs yan lag bzhi rnam par bkod pa 'di ni/ rgyal po rnam pa sa ra'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa rnam
213b1('bum): par bkod pas kyang de tsam myi phod/ rgyal po'i sde rab 'pham byed dang / shag kya rnams dang / la tsi'i byi rnams kyi dpung gi cho gas lan lag bzhi pa rnam par bkod pas kyang de tsam myi phod do// bdud sdig to can 'di ni yun ring po
213b2('bum): nas bcom ldan 'das la yang klags lta zhing klags tshol ba sems can yang dag par/ spong ba rnams la yang mche ba'i bsam pa can yin gis/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yang dag par bsam par bya'o// dran
213b3('bum): pas brjod par bya'o snyam nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di yang dag par bsams te/ dran pas gsal bar brjod pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gis/ ji lta ji ltar shes rab kyi
213b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bsal bar brjod pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can de dag lam de nyid dang sgo nyid nas phyir log go// de nas 'kho ra de'i rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnying 'og myin gi lha'i bar du ji snyed cig
213b5('bum): 'khor ba de dag gis lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / na bza mang po/ mngon par sprul nas/ bar snang gi nam mkha' la 'khod bzhin nyedu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der gtor to// bcom ldan 'das gang
213b6('bum): na ba der mngon par gtogs nas tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'jam bu'i gling gi myi 'di rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'di la yun rong bar spyod par gyu ra cig/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ji srid du shes rab
213b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing dge / 'dun dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig
213b8('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyu ro// 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams ji srid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad pa de srid du stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams dang / phyogs bcu'i kun gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi bar
214a1('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur zhe ro/ 
214a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur zhe'o// phyogs gang na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ma de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bros shing glegs bam du byas te/ 2
214a3('bum): mam phyags de ni sdang ba dang ldan par rig par bya'o// phyogs de ni 'gan dang cas shing mun pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang ba brgya tshan dang / 'ag/ me ga par ga lta'i bu dag la 'di ska
214a4('bum): ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shika de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ srong du 'jam bu'i gling dag myi rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa 'jil spyod pa de srid ru/ de ban
214a5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nub par myi 'gyur la/ dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
214a6('bum): slong gsu ma ga slong chen po'i 'jig rten po khams dang phyogs pa cu kun gi 'jig rten go khams kyi bar ga de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ nub par mi 'gyur la/ dpar
214a7('bum): chos kyang yun ring du gnas shing / dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par du 'phags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro// phyogs pa/ 
214a8('bum): na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang bris shing glegs bam du bris te/ 'chang ba'i phyogs de ni snang ba dang ldan par ngas shes so// phyogs de ni 'gon dang bcas shing mun pa dang bral
214b1('bum): rangs shes so// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i mye tog mang po mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der mngon par gtor to// 'di skad du tshig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang
214b2('bum): la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid cing tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdud dam bdud kyi ris su rtogs pa'i lha glags tshol ba rnams kyis klags myi rnyed do// 
214b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la rtag tu rgyun myi 'chad par srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bskang bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
214b4('bum): rolang tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chun ba par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de ni ston pa'i ston pa dang / 'tshungs pa tsam du bdag cag sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
214b5('bum): gis bcom ldan 'angs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ma ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha// rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 
214b6('bum): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mang ba dang ldan pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gi sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par
214b7('bum): bzung pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / 
214b8('bum): klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni/ dge ba'i bshes nyen gis yongasu bzung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
215a1('bum): 'di las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di btsal bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen
215a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan
215a3('bum): ma lhags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di la gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchiso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ ke'u
215a4('bum): shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni de bzhin gshe dgas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las byung ba
215a5('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u ni ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad
215a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid do la gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// 
215a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o// de nasu bya nomu ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis
215a8('bum): ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mying yongs su brjod pa mdzad pa de ltar/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa'i skyeng yang yongs su brjod
215b1('bum): pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar brtsom 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i
215b2('bum): mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar nang stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar phyi stong pa nyid kyi mying yang
215b3('bum): yongs su brjod pa ma mngang / de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi myang yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar snang ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi myong yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rten pa snang pa nyid kyi slong yang yangs su/ 
215b4('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs
215b5('bum): su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi da kyi mying yang yong su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar thog ma dang tha dam myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar
215b6('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdza nga / de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi myong yang yongs su ba pa ma mdzad/ de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi myong yang yongs su
215b7('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongasu brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yongasu
215b8('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mying yang yong su brjod pa medzad/ de ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid snang ba nyid kyi mying yang yong su brjod pa ma mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
216a1('bum): mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mying yang yongasasu brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul
216a2('bum): gi rkang pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar dbang po rnams kyi mying yang yong su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar stobs rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi
216a3('bum): mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa'i mying yang yongasu brjod pa ma mdzad/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i myong yang yong su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar 'phags pa'i
216a4('bum): bden pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ba sam gtan rnams kyi mying yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar tsha nga du myed pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzugs myed
216a5('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdza // ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i myong yang yod su brjod pa ma mdzad pa/ de ltar rnam par tha ra pa brgyad kyi myong yang yongs
216a6('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga ba dgu'i mying yang yongasu brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa mying yang yongs su brjod ma
216a7('bum): ma mdzad/ de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi myong yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma
216a8('bum): mdzad/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i myong yang yongs su
216b1('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad ta de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i mying yang yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar snying rje chen po'i mying yongs su brjod pa ma mdzad/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mying yongs su
216b2('bum): brjod pa ma mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di lta ste pha rol sa tu phyin pa lnga dang / stong pa nyid thams ca jidzing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / 24
216b3('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par sa 'jug pa mal+li dang / rna bar
216b4('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ra dang / mngon par shes pa rnaMs dang / ting nge 'dzin rnaMs dang / gzungs kyi sgo rjes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa
216b5('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag gi thog mar 'gro ba'o// kun tu/ 'dren pa'o// ngag bre de ji snyam du seMs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
216b6('bum): du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
216b7('bum): pa nyid yongs su ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ji snyam du sems/ rna pa thes cad
216b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa bzod pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsal pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyis bka' stsal nga / de nga snyam du ses/ rnam pa thams
217a1('bum): cang ma khyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyid pa yin napa/ gsal pa'o bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de
217a2('bum): snyam du sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa'i bsam gtan bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam/ gsal pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sum ngas
217a3('bum): de ji snyam du sems rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du/ yongasu ma bsngos pa ri shes rab shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
217a4('bum): pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nga lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongasu bsngos de'i tshul khrims ca tshul khrims kyi pha rol ba lcags rnam pa thams
217a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongasu bsngos pa'i bzod pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa lags/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus ba rtson 'grus kyi pha rol // 
217a6('bum): tu phyin pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gtan te bas gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab/ shes kyi pha
217a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ dga'o gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// myi skye ba'i tshul dang / 
217a8('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngos pa'i sbyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i phar lab tu phyin pa yin no// gnyi su myed pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims ni
217b1('bum): klub thams kyis mang tsun pa ya / rgya skye ba'i danus dang / phyi dmyigs par tshul gas/ rnam pa thams cad mabyen pa nyid du 'angs su bsngos pa'i tshul rnams ni mu la tshams supa na mang sa bya dang ma pa / gnyis su skyen
217b2('bum): pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdus pa'i bzod pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa yin no// gyi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mangs su bsdus pa'i
217b3('bum): bzod pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin ni// du gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsdus pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang / 
217b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson grus ni/ brdzun 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yin no// gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos
217b5('bum): pa'i bsam gtan ni/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// myi skye ba ge'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyenan pa nyid du yongasasu sngos pa'i bsam gdan ni bsam gdan gi pha rol tu
217b6('bum): phyind pa yin no// gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad ma khyen da pa nyid du yong su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa yin no// mi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ 
217b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gsol pa la bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi dmyig skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs
217b8('bum): ba'i rdul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yong su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thas cang / 
218a1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i tshul khrims/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
218a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa lags/ tshal khams kyi ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
218a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i brtson 'grus/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lags/ ji ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
218a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i bsam gta na/ bsam gtan gri pha rol tu phyind pa lags/ ji sa ltar gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi skye ba'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs
218a5('bum): pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i shes rab/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ gzugs gnyis su myed/ 
218a6('bum): nga'i tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig gnyis
218a7('bum): su myong ba'i tshul dang / rna ba gnyis su sred pa'i tshul dang / snga gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sgo gnyis su myeng po'i tshul dang / lus gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ying gnyis su myong ba'i du ba dang / yang gnyis du
218a8('bum): myed tshul dang / gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sgra gnyis su myang ba'i tshul dang / dri gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ro gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / reg gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chos gnyis su
218b1('bum): myed pa'i tshul dang myig gi rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gnyis
218b2('bum): su myed pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
218b3('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis
218b4('bum): su myed pa'i tshul dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad
218b5('bum): kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su myong ba'i tshul dang / lus kyi 'du byas te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yid
218b6('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / chu'i kham ma gnyis su myong ba'i tshul dang / me'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rlung gi khas
218b7('bum): gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / nam mkha'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang // ma rig pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed gnyis su myong ba'i tshul/ 
218b8('bum): dang / rnam par shes pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mying dang gzugs gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / skye mched drug gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / reg pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba gnyis su myed
219a1('bum): ba'i tshus dang / sred pa gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / len pa gnyis su sred pa'i tshul dang/ srid pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dru/ skye ba gnyis su sring pa'i tshus dang / na shrI gnyis su myed
219a2('bum): rdul de sbyin pa'i 'i mang bya phyin pa gnyis su myong pa'i tshul dang / rgyam gyims kyi pa ma na pa'i gnyis su meng pa'i tshus dang/ yid pa'i pa ba tu gnyis su myed pa'i tshus
219a3('bum): 'grus kyi pa ri bang tu phyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i rdus dang / bsas gtan gang 'o mang tu sbyin pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul da/ shes rab kyi pa ro sang du byed pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / nang stong pa nyid gnyi su
219a4('bum): myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyi nga gnyis su mang pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su meng / 
219a5('bum): pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su myeng pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma bya su stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa/ 
219a6('bum): stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul
219a7('bum): dang / chos sathams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i stong po nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong po nyid gnyis
219a8('bum): su myed pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par
219b1('bum): spong ba rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / dbang po rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / stobs rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnas/ 
219b2('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / bsam gtan gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa rnas/ 
219b3('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni
219b4('bum): gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / mdo na par shes pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / ting nge 'dzinang
219b5('bum): rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gnyi/ sa su myed ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi gnyis su myi
219b6('bum): pa'i tshul dang / so sa yang dag par rig pa rnams gnyis su myed pa'i tshul dang / snying rje chen po gnyis su myeng pa'i tshul dang / sangasargyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang / 
219b7('bum): rgyung du zhu sa 'i sras bu gnyis su byed 'i tshul dang / yi cig pa ming ba'i dus du gnyis su seM tshul du/ phyir tshu' 'i sras du gnyis su myed 'i rdul nga dmas
219b8('bum): drim dang / byang chu ba gnyis su sring 'i tshul dang / thar byed pa pa dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub ga sa su sre pa'i nus gyis so// ga 'dag bcom ldan 'das 'i ltar gzugs gnyis su rtsi/ 
220a1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du shes gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa
220a2('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce gnyis su ma mchis
220a3('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sgra gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
220a4('bum): ji ltar dri gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ro gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar reg gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myig gi
220a5('bum): rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji lta/ nare rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar// sna'i rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji lce'i rnam
220a6('bum): par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bu sa kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar
220a7('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus
220a8('bum): te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji ltar myig gi 'dus te
220b1('bum): reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchi/ 
220b2('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg
220b3('bum): pa'i rkye nad kyis tshe rab gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji ltar sa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chu'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar me'i khams gnyis su ma mchis
220b4('bum): pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rlung gi khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nam mkha'i khams gnyis pa su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
220b5('bum): tshul dang / ji ltar ma rig pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'du byed gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par shes pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mying
220b6('bum): dang gzugs gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye mched drug gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar reg pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshor gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / 
220b7('bum): ji ltar sred pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lon pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar srid pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar skye ba gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar/ 
220b8('bum): rga shi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bzod/ 
221a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
221a2('bum): tshul dang / ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nang stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ci ltar phyi stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar phyi nang
221a3('bum): stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid gnyis sum
221a4('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gnyis su ma
221a5('bum): mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong padang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dor ba myed pa stong nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid gnyis
221a6('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gnyi/ 
221a7('bum): sum mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar nga ba nyid stong pa nyid gnyis sum mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dngos po skyed pa'i ji na nyid stong ba nyid gnyis
221a8('bum): ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams gnyis
221b1('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar dbang pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar stobs rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / dri ltar byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang/ 
221b2('bum): ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bsam gtan rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul
221b3('bum): dang / ji ltar tshad myed pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par tha rad pa brgyad gnyis su ma mchis
221b4('bum): ba'i tshul dang / ji ltar mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnyis su ma mchi rgyas pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa gnyis
221b5('bum): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar mngon par shes pa rnam sa gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar ting nge 'dzind rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams
221b6('bum): gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar myi 'jig sra pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar so so yang dag par
221b7('bum): rig pa bzhi gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar snying rje chen po gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rgyu nad tu
221b8('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang // ji lta zer phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji
222a1('bum): ltar dgra bcom pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rang byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar rnam pa
222a2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / ji ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyis su ma mchis pa'i tshul gas lags// 
222a3('bum): bam po / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
222a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed
222a5('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do// 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du shes dang pha rol tu phyin / 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis
222a6('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'du byed dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam
222a7('bum): par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// myig ni myig gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar
222a8('bum): myed do// rna ba ni rna bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// sna ni sna yis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna dang pha rol tu
222b1('bum): phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// lce ni lces stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce dang pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ de ci'i/ 
222b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed do// 
222b3('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di lta dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sgra ni sgras stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
222b4('bum): zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sgra dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis da su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ dri ni dris stong ste/ de ci'i phyirazhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dri dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed do// 
222b5('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// ro ni ros stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ro dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// reg ni reg gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
222b6('bum): de ni 'di ltar reg dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myeng de gnyis su byar med do// chos ni chos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su
222b7('bum): byar myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// 
222b8('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni snga'i
223a1('bum): rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par
223a2('bum): shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa dang pha rold tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ 
223a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
223a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig
223a5('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna ba'i 'dus te/ 
223a6('bum): rig pa dang pa ro lang du phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te rnyog pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg par ra
223a7('bum): de yang tu phyind pa 'od dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas spyong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lde'i 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyin
223a8('bum): 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag
223b1('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i de ci phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de
223b2('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang gi
223b3('bum): phyarol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas snying ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rna bu'i/ 
223b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyinang/ pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus la te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba so stong
223b5('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni
223b6('bum): l-I'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas snang ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ deni 'di ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byur myed de/ lus kyi 'dus
223b7('bum): te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshe rabs stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dang pa ro lang du phyen po 'di dag gnyis du na
223b8('bum): de gnyis su byar byed do// yid kyi dus te reg pa'i byid kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i byin kyis tsho rabs stong ste/ deci'i phyir zhe na/ deni 'di ltar yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
224a1('bum): 6/ pha rolang tu phyi nang pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sa'i khams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/ 
224a2('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// chu'i khams ni chu'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chu'i khams dang pha rold tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ mye'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong
224a3('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar me'i khams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rlung gi khas
224a4('bum): dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ da ni 'di ltar nam mkha'i khams dang pha rol tu phyind/ 
224a5('bum): pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myeng ngo do// rnam par shes pa'i kham nyes ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams dang pha rol tu
224a6('bum): byin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ma rig pa dang po rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// 'du
224a7('bum): byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// dri ni 'di ltar 'du byed dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar byed do// rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
224a8('bum): de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su byar myed do/ mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mying dang gzugs dang pha rol tu phyin/ 
224b1('bum): napa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched drug dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// reg pa
224b2('bum): ni reg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar reg pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang pha rold tu phyin
224b3('bum): pa 'di dag gnyis su myang de gnyis su byar myed do// sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sred pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// lend pa ni lend pas
224b4('bum): stong ste/ de ni 'di ltar le nad pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srid pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag
224b5('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/ de ci pa'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye ba dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ngag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ rga shi ni rga shis
224b6('bum): stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ do ni 'di ltar rga shi dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe/ 
224b7('bum): na/ de ni 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
224b8('bum): de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha
225a1('bum): rol tu phyind pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
225a2('bum): 'di ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ de cim
225a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myong de gnyis su byar myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas stong ste/ 
225a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed // nang snang pa nyid ni stong pa/ nyid kyis steng ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar nang snang
225a5('bum): pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/ ga'i sa su byar myed do// phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyi stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa
225a6('bum): 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis
225a7('bum): su byar myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ chen
225a8('bum): po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chen po stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa
225b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol du tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
225b2('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
225b3('bum): ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su byar myed de gnyis su byar myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
225b4('bum): ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ga gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
225b5('bum): na/ de ni 'di ltar thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol da tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
225b6('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
225b7('bum): ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad
225b8('bum): stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
226a1('bum): dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi dmyigs pa stong pa
226a2('bum): nyid nga pa lang tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myeng nga gnyis su byer myed do/ dngos po myeng bsnang ba nyid ni dngos po myed pa zang po nyid kyis stong ste/ detso phyir zhe na/ don 'di ltar dngos po myed pa stong po nyid pa ma / 
226a3('bum): tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed/ 
226a4('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed/ 
226a5('bum): do/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa nye bar ga zhag pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis
226a6('bum): su byar myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rna/ mas kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba rnams dang pha rol tu phyinod pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis
226a7('bum): su byar myed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gri rkang pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// 
226a8('bum): dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni 'di ltar dbang po rnams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i
226b1('bum): phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar stobs rnams dpapa mang tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byur myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'dri sar/ 
226b2('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su mye de gnyis su byar myong // lam ni lam gos stong ste/ de ci'i byor zhi na/ don 'di ltar lam dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed/ 
226b3('bum): de gnyis su byar myed do// 'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis skyong / ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / pha rolang tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su
226b4('bum): mye de gnyis su byar med do// bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gra/ na rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bsam gtan rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis
226b5('bum): su byar myed do// tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshad myed pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su mying de gnyis su byar myed do// gzugs/ 
226b6('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag
226b7('bum): gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par thar pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de
226b8('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mthar da kyis gnas pa'i smos
227a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan
227a2('bum): ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// mngon
227a3('bum): par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// ting nge 'dzind rnams ni ting nge
227a4('bum): 'dzind rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ de
227a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lta gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnas
227a6('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de ga nyis su byar myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams ni myi 'jigs pa rnams
227a7('bum): kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de/ gnyis su byar myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams na so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong
227a8('bum): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myang ngo // snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
227b1('bum): snying rje chen po dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs
227b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rgyu nad tu
227b3('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
227b4('bum): 'bras bu dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myeng dro/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / 
227b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gi gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dga' bcom pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis
227b6('bum): su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// rang byang chub ni rang byang chub ni kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da ni 'di ltar rang byang chub dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid
227b7('bum): ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni
227b8('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dag gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// dga' bo de
228a1('bum): lta bas na pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag gi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// stong pa nyid thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do/ byang chub kyi
228a2('bum): phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa nyid do// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa nyid do// bsam gtan bzhi'i thog mar 'go
228a3('bum): ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// tshad myed pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
228a4('bum): nyid do/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab da kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dga' thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// rnam
228a5('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do// ma ngon par shes pa rnams kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
228a6('bum): nyid do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi thog mar 'gre ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ 
228a7('bum): bcu'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol
228a8('bum): tu phyin pa nyid do// snying rje chen po'i thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do/ thams cad shes
228b1('bum): pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi thog mar 'gro ba ni shes rab
228b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid do// dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po la sa bon btab pa rgyu rkye nad tshogs par gyur nas rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur yang / sa chen po ni sa bon de dag gi gnas te/ sa chen po la rten
228b3('bum): cing sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brten cing pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag rnam par 'phel lo// nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// phyi stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// 
228b4('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// chen po stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ don dmadab stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel
228b5('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// mtha' la/ sa 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// thog ma dang tha ma myed ba stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel
228b6('bum): lo/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// dngos po myed
228b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo// yang dag par spong ba rnams
228b8('bum): rnam par 'phel lo// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo// dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel lo// stobs rnams rnam par 'phel lo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rnam parta 'phel lo// 'phags pa'i lam
229a1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa rnam par 'phel lo// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo// bsam gtan rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ tshad myed pa rnams rnam par 'phel-i lo// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
229a2('bum): par 'jug pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo// rnam par tha ra pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'phel lo// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myong ba dang smon pa
229a3('bum): myed pa rnam par 'phel lo// mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo// ting nge 'dzind rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo/ myi
229a4('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// snying rje chechen po rnam par 'phel lo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'phel lo// thams cad shes pa nyid rnam
229a5('bum): par 'phel lo// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa tha/ sems cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par 'phel te/ dga' bo rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyend pa la rtend cing pha rol tu phyind pa lnga rnam par
229a6('bum): 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid la rtend cing stong pa nyid thams cang rnam par 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnam par 'brel lo// rnam pa thams
229a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtend cing / yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing
229a8('bum): dbang po lnga rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rten cing / stobs lnga rnam skar 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rten cing / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa
229b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
229b2('bum): pa nyid la rtend cing / bsam gtan bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / tshad myed pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / gzugs myed pa'i
229b3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing rnam par tha ra pa brgyad rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa lha rtend cing / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
229b4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dal rtend cing rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa/ dang smond pa myed pa rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
229b5('bum): pa nyid la rtend cing / mngon par shes pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / ting nge 'dzind rnams rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / 
229b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam par 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnam par 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / myi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam
229b7('bum): par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / snying rje chen po rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad
229b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la rtend cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtend cing / thams cad shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
230a1('bum): nyid la rtend cing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtend cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par 'phel lo// dga' bo de lta bas na/ shes rab
230a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid ni pha rol tu phyind pa lnga po 'di dag yongs su grub pa'o// stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su sgrub bo// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su bsgrub pa'o// 
230a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// dbang po lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o// stobs lnga yongs su sgrub pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su sgrub pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su sgrub pa'o// 
230a4('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi yod sa su sgrub pa'o// tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// gzug das myed pa'i snyoms par 'brug pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// rnam par
230a5('bum): tha rad pa brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa/ ter 'jug pa dgu yongs su sgrub bo/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yongs su sgrub pa'o// mngon
230a6('bum): par shes pa rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o// ting nge 'dzind rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su sgrub pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su
230a7('bum): sgrub pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su sgrub pa'o// snying rje chen po yongs su bsgrub pa'i/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sgrub pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o// lam skye/ 
230a8('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yongs su sgrub pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/ 
230b1('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan gang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la thos te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'dzind pa/ 
230b2('bum): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / yongs su chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phanid pa 'di'i yon tan gang ji snyed cig bdag gis/ 
230b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das las bzung ste/ bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang / spel ba de dag thams cad bka' ma sul te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs/ 
230b4('bum): pa dang spel ba dang tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/ dge ba bcu'i ngalas kyi lam rnams 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi 'jig gtan du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa bzhi 'jig
230b5('bum): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ pa bzhi 'jig rten tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mngon par shes/ pa lnga 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
230b6('bum): phyi nad pa 'jig gtan du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin dpa 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
230b7('bum): byind pa 'jig rtenang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'jig rtenang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ nang stong pa nyid 'jig garten du
230b8('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid 'jig rtenang du 'byung / 
231a1('bum): bar 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtha' las
231a2('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa snang ba nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'jig rten du
231a3('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'jig rtenang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
231a4('bum): po myed nga stong pa nyid 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid spyong ba shing 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dngas pa skyeng pa'i nganang nyid stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dran pa 'angar
231a5('bum): gzhog pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ yang dag par sprid/ ba bzhi 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi na nga ba bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lnga 'jig
231a6('bum): nad du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ stobs lnga 'jog rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun 'jig rten cu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba
231a7('bum): 'gyur ro/ 'phags pa'i dzin pa pa ni 'jig rten du 'byung ngar 'gyurar/ rnam par tha pa brgyad mi ga tsun du 'byung bar 'gyu rong/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'jig rten du 'byung bar rgyu
231a8('bum): rnam pa pa'i blo spong ba'i dang mtshanas byed pa nga seM nga byed pa dig na du yus la gyu ro// ti nge zhi cim cad ming rten du byung bar 'gyur ro// gzus kyi skams cad 'jig rten du 'byung tshu / 
231b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa'abazhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'jig rtenang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po 'jig
231b2('bum): rtenang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klag pa dang / kun chub par
231b3('bum): bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho rnams 'jig rtenang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rtenang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyim bdag gi rigs che
231b4('bum): zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rtend du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rtenang du mchis so// sum bcu rtsags mra gi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// mche ma'i lha rnams 'jig
231b5('bum): rtend namachis so// dga' ldan go lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// gzhan la phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis sa/ tshangs ris
231b6('bum): kyi lha rnams 'jig rtend na mchis so// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams 'ji ga rtend na mchis so// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams 'jig rte nang na mchis so// tshangs chen gri lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis sa
231b7('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// chung snang gi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// dge ba'i lha nas
231b8('bum): 'ag rten na mchis so// rlung dge'i lharnams 'jig rten na mchis so// tshad bye dge ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten mtsho/ 
232a1('bum): so/ chung che'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// myi che ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis
232a2('bum): so/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten du mchis so// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// 'og myin gyi lha rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// 
232a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis
232a4('bum): so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams 'jig rten/ na mchis so// dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// rang sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten na mchis
232a5('bum): so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na mchis so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par
232a6('bum): bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rtenang du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ 
232a7('bum): ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byas pa de'i yon tan ni der zang
232a8('bum): bar mangs bshad / ke'u shi ka ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'tshang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du/ 
232b1('bum): yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ tshul khrims kyi phur nga po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
232b2('bum): tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po
232b3('bum): tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams
232b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ shes rab kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa
232b5('bum): dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam par thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ rnam par grol ba'i phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// 
232b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzind pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chu ba par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
232b7('bum): pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po tshad myed pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di 'dzin
232b8('bum): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i don du zhugs pa'i
233a1('bum): rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye/ 
233a2('bum): shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po
233a3('bum): ye shes mthong ba'i phung po las/ ke'u shi ka tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / nyan thos dang / 
233a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung pos brgya'i char yang nye bar
233a5('bum): mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char/ yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// bye ba/ brgya'i char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi
233a6('bum): 'gro'o/ bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ bya ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o// grangs su yang nye bar myi 'gro 'o/ char yang nye bar myi 'gro'o/ bgrang bar yang nye bar myi 'gro ma
