262b3('bum): snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga
262b4('bum): yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ dbang po rnams ba kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ga dang de dag kyang dbang po rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das stobs lnga/ 
262b5('bum): 'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ stobs rnams/ kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchiso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dag kyang stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
262b6('bum): kyi yan lag dbadun gyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi snod do// 
262b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i yon tan ni tshe ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag
262b8('bum): kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i/ yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// 
263a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste// bsam gtan rnams kyi yon tan
263a2('bum): ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das tshad myed pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad mchis// 
263a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang tshad myed pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
263a4('bum): rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de drug kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi snod do// / bcom ldan 'das rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi yon tan niH
263a5('bum): lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi yon tan ni ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rna par thar pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das mthar
263a6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i yon tan lha ji snyed cig brjod par bgro ste/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang
263a7('bum): mtha kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi stong ngo // maldan 'das rnam par bad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang macan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i yon tan su ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam par
263a8('bum): ba'i sgo rnams kyi yon tan na tshad ma mchis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams kyi sdong ngo // bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjo sa
263b1('bum): bgyi ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mngon par shes par rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan sku 'i sring
263b2('bum): cig brjod par bgyi ste/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs kyi yon tan lta ji snyed rtsi/ 
263b3('bum): brjod par bgyi ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i yon tan lnga
263b4('bum): ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das myi 'jigs pa
263b5('bum): bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi yo na tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi 'jigs pa rnas kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das
263b6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi yon tan na tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang so so yang
263b7('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po'i yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ snying rje chen po'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang snying rje chen ni/ 
263b8('bum): sdod do// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs kyi yon na ni nang ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung // 
264a1('bum): dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshes
264a2('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang thams cad kyi shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ lem gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de ban
264a3('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rnam pa thams ca cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon/ 
264a4('bum): tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan
264a5('bum): ni tshad mchis so// de bzhi gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang de bzhi na gnyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyi da kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ me nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi
264a6('bum): yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung dede ga kyang ma no rad pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das ga zhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan lha ji skad cig brjod par bgyi ste/ 
264a7('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'a// das chos nyid kyi yon tan lci snyed cig brjod par bgyi
264a8('bum): chos nyid kyi yon tan ni chad ma mchis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos nyid kyi snong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan lnga ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshad mchig/ 
264b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshes/ 
264b2('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang chos kyi gnas nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ chos myi 'gyur ba nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gsheg pa'i skrag tu
264b3('bum): de dag kyang chos myi 'gyur nyid kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang yang
264b4('bum): dag pa'i mtha'i snod do// bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ bse gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi yon tan ni tshwa ma mchis so// de bzhin
264b5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i nga byings kyi snod do// bcom ldan 'das bag chags kyi mtshas sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig
264b6('bum): brjod par bgyi ste/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i yon tan tan ni tshad ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thas cad kyi snod do// bcom ldan
264b7('bum): 'das rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ rtag tu gtang snyos la gan+d+ha pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchiso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rtag tu gtang snyoms la gan+da pa'i snod do// 
264b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das myi mnye ba'i chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/ mi mnya pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang myi mnye ba'i chos nyid kyi snod do// 
265a1('bum): a/ de na bzhi gshegs pa u nga / lam ldan sa dpazhin ga gags pa'i thug tu dgan ma phyin pa ma shA / rang sa dang bzhin ga gags pa'i rna bachung dag da dpapa / mam
265a2('bum): debazhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dgo na mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinag ste/ 
265a3('bum): pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha re lang tu phyin pa myi skye myi 'gag pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyi nad pa blang ba ma
265a4('bum): mchis pa dang / dor ba ma mchis pa'i sdod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gtung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha ri lang tu phyind pa 'bri ba dang / ldan pa ma
265a5('bum): mchis pa'i snod do// de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung / de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe dgas pa'i sku gtung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 
265a6('bum): gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gtung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i skung gdung de dag kyang pha ro lang tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyi sa
265a7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyind pa'i chos nyid kyis yongs su sgom pa'o/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga' la na/ 
265a8('bum): yang srong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur rnam pa la zhog gi/ bcom ldan 'das/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gling ge'i klung gi bye ma snyed cigang ba'i/ 
265b1('bum): khri min gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur lham pa dang / shes rab kyi pha'i yang tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris pa zhig tu langan dra/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nyid len to
265b2('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa yongs su sr-i
265b3('bum): pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gtung de dag mchod pa mnga'o ste/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la/ rim gror bgyid pa dang / bkur stir bgyid pa dang / phu dud du bgyid pa
265b4('bum): pa dang mchod par bgyid pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de mtha' myi dmyigs shing rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba dang / bram ze'i rigs che zhing mthong ba dang khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dang nga rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/ 
265b5('bum): sum brna rtsa gsum gi lha'i/ mtshe ma'i lha'am/ dga' ldan gi lha 'am/ 'phrul dga'i lha 'am/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du myi dang lha phun sum tshogs pa dang bde ba myong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sku/ 
265b6('bum): sbal kam thar 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'dres bu ni/ de tsam du bas kyi shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa 'di 'azung zhing bcangs pa dang / klags shing kun nu ba bar bgyis pa dang / tshul bzhin tu ming
265b7('bum): bgyis na ting nge 'dzind kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phar/ 
265b8('bum): dpa so su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// smyon pa'i par mang na byedang mang su rdzogs par 'gyur/ rang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogasu par 'gyuraro// phyi rang myong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyu/ 
266a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'as byas stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par 'gyur 'dus
266a2('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur/ 
266a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs
266a4('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su dgas par 'gyur ro/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs/ 
266a5('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi yos su rdzogs par
266a6('bum): 'gyur ro dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rgyad pa yongs su/ rdzogs par 'gyu
266a7('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'dug po bzhi yongasasu rdzogasapa
266b1('bum): 'gyur ro// rnam par thar da pargyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smo
266b2('bum): pamyed pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzi nad rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongasasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de
266b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs
266b4('bum): par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad yongs su/ rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de ched du bsams te/ lus yongs su / gas par 'gyur/ lus de dag gis sems can/ yongs su smyid/ 
266b5('bum): par bgyid par 'gyur te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ ma bdag gi rigs che zheng mtho ba 'am/ zhen skyes pa'i lus sam
266b6('bum): rgya byin gyi gzugs ma tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ ngal so'i gzugs kyang rung ste/ lus de dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das
266b7('bum): byang chub pa'i skyon myed par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems pa'i mngon par shes pa thob nas/ sang sa rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar
266b8('bum): ro/ bcom ldan sa 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis pa yang ma lags glo ba ma ches pa yong ma mchis/ mchod par myi 'tshal ba yang ma lags/ bzung bar mi 'tshal ba ma
267a1('bum): lags ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang bkur sti dang phu dud dang mchod par bgyis na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
267a2('bum): kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su 'dzind par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la yang rim gro dang bkur sti dang / phu dud dang mchod par bgyis par
267a3('bum): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenang gi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa da gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig
267a4('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag thams cad chos kyi skung dang gzugs kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku mthong bar 'tshal zhing mcho da par 'tshal bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid bcungs
267a5('bum): bgyi bcang bar bgyi glag par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi mchod par bgyi gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ tshul bzhin du ma da la bgyi ste/ rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs su rmi
267a6('bum): 'jig rten gi khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinas
267a7('bum): ma spyong ba des chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa snyam par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ga
267a8('bum): na kyi ba sa kyi pa ji du kyis yang kyi gag par kyi ku chu pa'i dgyi pa kyi gzhan yutsha ma ga par ga par gyi/ sa ny-i chu bani du so/ 
267b1('bum): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de gnyis gang zhe na 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang 'dus ma byas chos rnams kyi chos nyid do// bcom ldan 'das de la 'dus byas chos rnams kyi chos te/ 
267b2('bum): gang lags zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang chen po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / 
267b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang rang bzhin
267b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa
267b5('bum): nyid kyi ye shes dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / yang dag par spro dang ba bzhi'i ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / 
267b6('bum): dbang po lnga'i ye shes dang stobs lnga'i ye shes dang / byang chub kyi yan la ga bdun gi ye shes dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ye shes dang / 'phags pa'i len pa bzhi'i ye shes dang bas rten
267b7('bum): bzhi'i ye shes dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i ye shes dang / rna bar thar pa brgyad kyi ye shes dang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i ye shes dang rna bar
267b8('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa/ shes dang mngon par shes pa lnga'i ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyi ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ye shes dang mi 'jig pa ni
268a1('bum): ye shes dngas so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ye shes dang snying rje chen po'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang / mi dge ba'i chos
268a2('bum): rnams kyi ye shes dang zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang zag pa med bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang 'jig rten gi chos rnams kyi ye shes dang 'jig rten lnga
268a3('bum): 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang gang lags pa de ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags zhe na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang 'gag pa ma mchis
268a4('bum): pa dang gnas pa ma mchis pa dang gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang 'phel ba ma mchis pa dang / 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ 
268a5('bum): de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do// chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lag sa zhe na/ chos thas cad kyi dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid te/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o// bcom
268a6('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi
268a7('bum): pha roladu tu phyind pa 'dil brtend te/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
268a8('bum): gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// da ltar byung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khas
268b1('bum): tshad med grangs myed pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rted/ 
268b2('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig
268b3('bum): 'byung ba dang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
268b4('bum): rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la brten te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo 'thob
268b5('bum): po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras thob po 'thob po thob par 'gyuraro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob po 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// 'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / ma 'ongs
268b6('bum): pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gong ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang / de ltar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gi khams tshad myed grangs myed pa dag na rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
268b7('bum): tu phyind pa 'di nyid la brten te/ rang byang chub thob po 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag kyang
268b8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i tshul dang / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dang / skye ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa myed pa'i tshul dang kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i tshul dang / rnam par byang ba'i myed pa'i tshul dang / 
269a1('bum): ba'i tshul dang / mngon par 'du ba myed pa'i tshul dang / le nad pa'i myed pa'i tshul dang / 'dor ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 'bri ba myed pa'i tshul dang / bstand pa myed pa'i tshul dang / blang ba myed pa'i tshul dang / 
269a2('bum): spang ba myed pa'i tshul gis bstan te/ de yang 'jig rten gi tha snyad gi tshul gis bstand te/ don dam par ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ring du song ba ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin
269a3('bum): pa ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul rol ma yin pha rol ma yin/ thang du 'dug pa ma yin/ gshongad du 'dug pa ma yin/ mnyam pa ma yin/ myi mnyam pa ma yin/ mtshan ma ma yin/ mtshan
269a4('bum): ma myed pa ma yin/ 'jig rten pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das da pa ma yin/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yin// dge ba ma yin myi dge ba ma yin/ 'das pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma/ 
269a5('bum): yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yi na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa
269a6('bum): chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnam
269a7('bum): nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa yin/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pas
269a8('bum): yin/ so so skye ba'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no// / shes rab bam po// brgya byin gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes ra
269b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyind pa chen po ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang // / 
269b2('bum): spyod pa yang 'tshal te/ sems can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du gdags par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bdag du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sems can du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// srog tu
269b3('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'gro bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gso bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// skyes bur dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gang zag du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// shed can du dmyigs pa ma
269b4('bum): mchi so/ shed bdag tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// byed pa por dmyi gus pa ma mchis so// tshor ba por dmyigs pa ma mchiso/ shes pa por dmyigs pa ma mchis so// mthong ba por dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 
269b5('bum): gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// tshor bar dmyigs pa ma ma chi so/ 'du shes su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'du byed du/ dmyigs pa ma mchis// rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis// 
269b6('bum): myig tu dmyigs pa ma mchis/ rna bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// snar dmyigs pa ma mchis/ lcer dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lus su dmyigs pa ma mchis/ yid du dmyigs pa ma mchis/ gzugs su dmyigs pa ma
269b7('bum): mchis/ sgrar dmyigs pa ma mchis/ drir dmyigs pa ma mchis/ ror dmyigs pa ma mchis so// reg tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// chos su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// myig gi rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis
269b8('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis// sna'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis// lce'i rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi rna bar
270a1('bum): shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis// myig gi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis/ lce'i 'dus te reg par
270a2('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so// lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchiso// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
270a3('bum): byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar/ 
270a4('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'o/ tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sa'i khams su dmyigs dpa ma mchis so// chu'i kham su dmyigs pa ma mchis so/ me'i khas su
270a5('bum): dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rlung gi khams su dmyig su ma mchis/ nam mkha'i kham su dmyigs su ma mchis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// ma rig par dmyigs pa ma
270a6('bum): mchis so// 'du byed du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par shes par dmyigs pa ma mchis/ mying dang gzugs su dmyigs pa ma mchis/ skye mched drug tu dmyigs pa ma mchis so// reg par dmyigs pa ma mchis/ 
270a7('bum): tshor bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sred par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// len par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// srid par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// skye bar dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rga shir dmyigs pa ma mchis/ 
270a8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyig
270b1('bum): pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind par dmyigs pa ma mchis so// nang stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// phyi stong pa nyid du dmyigs/ 
270b2('bum): pa mchis so// phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// chen po stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 
270b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa
270b4('bum): ma mchis so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
270b5('bum): du dmyigs pa ma mchis/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs/ pa ma mchis so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma/ mchis so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis/ dngos po
270b6('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams su dmyig
270b7('bum): pa ma mchis so// dbang po rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// stobs rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmyig
270b8('bum): ya ma mchis so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// bsam gtan rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// tshad myed pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
271a1('bum): ba rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// rnam par thard pargyad du myigs pa ma mchiso// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmyigs pa mchis so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
271a2('bum): myed pa dang smon pa myed par dmyigs pa mya mchis so// mngon par shes pa rnam su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// ting nge 'dzinang rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnam su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// de bzhin
271a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// myi 'jigs pa rnam su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnamasu myigs pa ma mchis so// snying rje chen por dmyigs pa mchi so/ sangs rgyas
271a4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmyigs pa ma mchis/ rgyu nad tu zhug pa nga'i 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchi sa// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur dmyigs pa ma mchis
271a5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchi so// rang byang chub tu m+bu/ gas pa ma mchis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid du dmyigs pa ma mchis so// byang chub tu dmyigs pa ma mchis/ sangs rgyas
271a6('bum): su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmyigs pa ma mchis so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni dmyigs pa'i tshul du gnas pa ma lags/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang gis dmyis
271a7('bum): par bgyi ba dang / ga la dmyigs par bgyi ba dang / gang du dmyigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsayod pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub seMs/ 
271a8('bum): dpa' seMs dpa' chen po des dmyigs pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha long tu phyind pa la yun ring por spyod pas/ des byang chub kyang myi dmyigs na/ sangs rgyas lta ci smos/ sangs kyi chos rnams lta ci smos/ rgya byin gis ga
271b1('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod kyi de ma lags pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bzhin la myi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ ke'u shi ka/ 
271b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyind pa drug po kun la yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul khris spyod de/ des sbyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ gtong ba yang myi dmyigs/ len pa yang myi dmigs so// tshul
271b3('bum): khrims kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang mi yin dmyigs/ tshul khrims ngan pa yang myi dmyigs so// bzod pa yang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ gnod sems dang ldan
271b4('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus dang myi dmyigs/ bsgo na 'grus dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ le lo yang myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan yang mi dmyigs/ bsam gtan
271b5('bum): dang ldan pa yang myi dmyigs/ 'khrug pa yang myi dmyigs so/ shes rab kyang myi dmyigs/ shes rab dang ldan pa yang myi dmyi gas shes rab 'chal pa yang myi dmyig so/ ke'u shi ka 'on kya
271b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du shes mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'du byed myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa mi dag
271b7('bum): pa'i rdul dang / myig myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / na ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / snga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lce myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lus myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang yid myi dmyigs pa'i drug
271b8('bum): gzugs myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang sgra myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang dri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ra myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / reg myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myig gi rnam par shes/ 
273a1('bum): skyed myigs pa ju chub sa par kyid gas pa sdu / swA sa pa snye ba gying dus dus skye phyig pa rdus da grus yinam / 
273a2('bum): kyad skyes po rnam dang / med kyinam pa da gas pa kyid dbyigs pa'i tshul dang // myig gi dus ga pa myed kyigs pa'i rgyal dang / ba'i dus te sa pa myi myigs pa rgyal dang / sna'i dus ga brnyed myigs
273a3('bum): sa ga bsti myigs pa'i la da / rgya sa ga stong rmugs hU~Mr / yad kyi kyi lus yin pakhyor rdzogs pa tshul dang // sgyog su ga pa sa byung ra
273a4('bum): dmas pa tshul dang / rlu ba kyig pa las byang ba tsho ba snying mig pa tshus dag 'a du ste ga pa sa ba bye gas tshus dang / tshus rig pa las byung ba di ba m+b+hi sbyi
273a5('bum): ba'i rdul dang / lus kyi 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mye myigasapa'i tshul da / yid kyi dus rig pa las nga 'i dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sa'i khams myi myigs pa'i
273a6('bum): rdul dang / nu'i khams myi myigs pa'i na da/ skye'i khams kyi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rdung ba ldamam myong kyigs pa cu na rnam pagrolamapo myong sa pa'i tshul dang / rnam par shes pa'o 'ams kyi
273a7('bum): dbyims pa'i tsus dang / so gas kyi ga chu dang / rtso m-ing ga ga sa ma sa gas dus dang / rdzun myi phyogs pa'i du sa dang skye sa chu byed byeg pa na
273a8('bum): reg pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshor ba skye dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / len pa mye dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / srid pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / skye ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rga shi myi
273b1('bum): dbyigs pa rjeb dang / sbyin ma mo khyi mang ba myed thugs pa 'dus dang / rdus rnams kyi paromang du da pa rtsigs pa'i rnanam dang / nga da par mang tu byed pa ste byigs pa du dang / phan / 
273b2('bum): kyi la kyi sa su gyis pa sa nga/ sa pa rgya du nga/ sa khyo khyo sa kyi ma phrul pa da kyi sa
273b3('bum): de kyi migs pa dres dang / phyid stong cing myi byegs pa'i dru ba dang / slong 'ad stong shing bye myigs pa'i chul dang / can pa sang banyid kyi rdzogs pa'i drib dang / dranang ma bathong shi kyi gas pa'i
273b4('bum): 'dus byas spong nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi sregs pa'i nul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mying ni gas pa'i tshul dang ga thog ma dang ba ma med pa song pa nyid mi dmyigs pa'i
273b5('bum): ngag deb myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi tshe myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong panyid / 
273b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i rdul dang / dngos pa myed pa'i phyi
273b7('bum): nyi stong pa nyid myi phyogs pa'i tshul dang / dran pa nye bar gnog po pa'i myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / yang dag par spong ba ban myed myigs pa'i drub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi myong stsogs pa'i rdul dang / dbang po lnga phyi / 
273b8('bum): ba tshul dang / skabs lnga myir myig pa'i tshul dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyig po'i tshul dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa pa'i myi dmyigs chus dang / sa ni/ 
274a1('bum): bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / tshad myed pa bzhi mi dmyigs pa'i tshul ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad myi dmyig pa'i tshul dang / mthar/ 
274a2('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / mngon par shes pa lnga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang ting nge 'dzin thams
274a3('bum): cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi
274a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul dang snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dadamyigs pa'i tshul dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
274a5('bum): 'bras bu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi m+b+hi gas pa'i tshul dang / dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyi/ gas pa'i tshul dang / rang byang chub myi dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyi/ 
274a6('bum): ba'i tshul dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi'i dmyigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha re lang tu phyi nang pa yongs su
274a7('bum): rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims srung ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol ba tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes ra/ 
274a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa yongs su sgrub pa'i 'bod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa ni/ 
274b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus ba rtsom pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni byang chub sems dpa'
274b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
274b3('bum): dpa' chen po chos la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu gling gi shing rnams lo ma sna tshogs can/ 
274b4('bum): me tog sna tshogs can/ 'bras bu sna tshogs can/ dbyangs sA/ tshegs can/ chu zhing sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang de dag gi grib ma la khyad par ram/ bye brag myi dmyigs te/ gzhan du na grib ma grib
274b5('bum): ma zhes bya bar grangs su 'gro bar zad do// ke'u shi ka de bzhin/ du pha rol tu phyi nang pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyi nad pas so// kyings su zi nang pas thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes yongs su sngos
274b6('bum): ba rnams la yang khyad par bye brag mi dmyigs so// brgya byin gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na yon tan thams cad yongs su/ rdzogs par
274b7('bum): bgyid pa'i slad du/ yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang / ldan pa'i slad du tshang
274b8('bum): ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni/ yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang / ldan pa'i slad du/ yon tan kun tu
275a1('bum): mtha' yas pa dang ldan pam/ bcom ldan 'as rigs kyi bu dang dgas kyi bum la sa thAg gas shes rab kyi par ba tu phyid pa'ang sa pa thegs pam du bsgos te bams pa smra ma ngas dang phreng bdang / 
275a2('bum): spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis bkur stir bgyis phu dud du bgyis mchod par bgyis te/ de nas gdaut+taji skad du bstan pa bzhi
275a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du bgyis te/ gzhan la rgya cher bka' stsal na de gnyis lnga
275a4('bum): gang gi bsod nams ches 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ ke'u shi ga di ji snyam du sems
275a5('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang 'phreng ba dang / spros dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang / 
275a6('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas bkur stir byas bu dung du byas mchod par byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung nyungs kar gi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te 'go'as/ 
275a7('bum): bya ba dang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung nyungs kar gi 'bru tsam blangs te/ me tog dang 'phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / 
275a8('bum): sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/ bkur stir byas phu dung du byas mchod par byas na/ de dag las bsod nams ches 'phel ba yin/ brgya byind kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
275b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang 'phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang
275b2('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bgyis bkur stir bgyis/ phu dung du bgyis/ mchod par bgyis pas gang la de bzhin gshegs pa pra bcom pa yang
275b3('bum): sku gdung nyungs kar gi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la stsal na/ de ni de bas che sod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang
275b4('bum): de nyid gzigs te rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag na rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/ sems can gi ris na de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i ring sel gis gdul ba'i sems can rnams kyi slad du thug
275b5('bum): rje chen po bskyed do/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byind/ kyis rlabs so// bcom ldan 'das gang la las chung ngu/ na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung nyungs kar gi 'bru tsam la mchod
275b6('bum): pa sna tshogs kyang mchod pa bgyid na/ de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar ma thug par sdug bsngal mthar 'byind par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de de bzhi
275b7('bum): na de de bzhin te/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal
275b8('bum): mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror byas/ bkur stir byas phu dud du byas mchod par byas pa bas gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te/ chos kyi dga' bas gzhan byin na rigs kyi
276a1('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi kra gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ji skad du snyan pa bzhin du gzhan gi drung du song ste/ bshad cing snyan pa dang / 
276a2('bum): brjod cing dgrol ba dang / rnam par phye ste gsol bar byas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag pas bsod nams cher 'phel te/ de ni ston pa'i yin par bsam mo// gla ma'i
276a3('bum): gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa 'tshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid ston pa yin te/ ston pa ni gzhan shes rab kyi pha rol
276a4('bum): tu phyind pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba myed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa nyid kyang ston pa/ ston pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyi nad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
276a5('bum): 'di nyid la bslabs pas 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / de ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
276a6('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshangs pa 'tshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las
276a7('bum): gud na myed de/ de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la bslabs shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par
276a8('bum): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la bslabs shing / nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// 
276b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams
276b2('bum): kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las slabs shing byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
276b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la slabs shing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs so// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
276b4('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mdo na par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de bas na rigs kyi
276b5('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco/ dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam ste la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza'
276b6('bum): dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / si la snyan sna tshogs kyis mngon du rim 'gro bya bar 'dod pa dang / bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang / phu dung du bya bar 'dod pa dang / mchod
276b7('bum): par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di dris te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / nu bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan
276b8('bum): sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// bu dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// ke'u shi ka ngas don de nyis kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa sang/ 
277a1('bum): rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/ gang zhig la bdag gis rim 'gror dang / bkur sti dang phu dud dang / mchod par bya ste/ rten cig rnam par spyad par bya snyam na/ ke'u shi ka de la ngas gang zhig 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas
277a2('bum): pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na nga dang 'dra ba 'am/ lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/ de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te de
277a3('bum): ltar yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim 'gro dang / bkur stir dang / phu rung dang / mchod par byas te/ rten cing rnam par sbyang bar bya'o snyam du bsam so// ke'u shi ka
277a4('bum): chos de yang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin te/ ke'u shi ka de ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim 'gror byed/ bkur stir byed/ phu dud du byed/ mchod par byed/ de ltar ris
277a5('bum): 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byas shing rnam par spro/ ngan/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na myed pa ya ngadag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'jo
277a6('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na ba za dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gro bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba/ 
277a7('bum): dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba lta ji smos/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'o/ 
277a8('bum): nyid la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gor bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang
277b1('bum): mchod par bya ba lci smos de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
277b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las byung ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so/ ke'u shi ka de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg
277b3('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid la me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / 
277b4('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dasil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim 'gror bya'o// bkur stir sna bya'o// daphu dud du bya'o// de ltar slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag ni
277b5('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon pa ra rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams
277b6('bum): kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
277b7('bum): phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba las/ le'u nyi shu gsunga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po rgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gal te/ 'dzam dure
277b8('bum): gling gi sems can de dag dge' ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur da na/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa ke'u shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gi shes rab kyi pha rol / 
277b9('bum): shig de ji snyam du seMs rig kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i rgyus bzod nas mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ gsolang
278a1('bum): tu phyind pa 'di bregs bam klag pa 'am/ bri ba 'am kha ton du bya ba'i phyir bzhin la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zab pa'i chos gang
278a2('bum): la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon myed par bzhugs par 'gyur pa dang / 'jug pa dang 'jug par gyur pa dang / rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / thob pa dang thob par
278a3('bum): gyurd pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur da pa dang / 'thob pa dang thob par gyur pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid
278a4('bum): thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / rangasang sa rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang / 'thob pa dang thob par 'gyur ba dang / bla na mye
278a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bzhugs pa rnas/ kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur/ pa dang / 'dug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa/ 
278a6('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher skad do/ 
278a7('bum): ke'u shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos rgya cher snyan pa de dag gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang bya/ 
278a8('bum): nub kyi ma lag 'du dang / 'phags pa'i sam sam ba rgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bdan pa pa'i dang / nang stong pa nyid dang byi song pa nyid dang / phyi nang kyang bzhi dang / nga shi'ing stong pa zhing dang / chen pa snang banyis
278b1('bum): dan dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin spang ba nyi
278b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar
278b3('bum): rgyang dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad dang / 'di dag
278b4('bum): ni zag pa med pa'i chos de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa las rgya cher ston to// de dag la slabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
278b5('bum): par sangs rgyaso// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzog sa par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka sems can gcig ce ga rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/ rigs kyi bu
278b6('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu ma de'i bsod nas ches mang du 'phel gi 'jam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i lam+bu kI lam la bkod pa'i sems cad
278b7('bum): ni sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su bkrol ba ma yin no// ke'u shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni sems can dmyal ba dang / 
278b8('bum): rgyam ma kyi s+ya gdas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten ras yongs su dgrol pa byer te/ ya gyig phyir 'a sa lus rung / phying mi 'ang ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom panyid la bgang pa stan rdzas/ ke nanan/ 
279a1('bum): la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod
279a2('bum): pa las la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig dang byang chub la yang gzhag na 'di'i bsod nams ces mang du 'phe lo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thas cad rang bang chub la bkod/ 
279a3('bum): pas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhag na/ 'di bsod nams ces mang du 'phelo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can gcig po bla na ma
279a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni gsangs rgya ngas kyi tshul rgyun myi 'chang ba'i don tu zhugs pa'i phyiraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i rgyun tu zhugs pa dang // 
279a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas pa rnamaso// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' la/ sa byung ba ni de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs bI sangs
279a6('bum): rgyas rnamaso// ke'u/ rnam grangs des na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim 'gror bya ba yin to// 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa'i
279a7('bum): skye dgus mu tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rimi 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phud dung du bya ba yin par she bar/ 
279a8('bum): bya'o// ke'u shig rigs kyi bu 'i rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'jam bu gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu ri las kyi la la bkod par gyur na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'i ris kyi bu mo de'i bsod/ 
279b1('bum): nas de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/ 
279b2('bum): gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di glegs bam bri ba 'am kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phelo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnaMs rgya
279b3('bum): bston to// de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyuraro// lan
279b4('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// 
279b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par rgyu rang to// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' se// sa dpa' chen po rnams kyang yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par 'gyur
279b6('bum): to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka/ 
279b7('bum): zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bas gtan gyi/ 
279b8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
280a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myod pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du
280a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dra
280a3('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags
280a4('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa na da dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang // par tha ra pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dzun
280a5('bum): pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed/ dang smon pa myong ba dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ding nge na thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs
280a6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dag
280a7('bum): ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du byas te klag pa dang / 
280a8('bum): bri ba dang kha don du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de ni bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol la tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bsand te/ de dag yodan
280b1('bum): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yu
280b2('bum): mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshang
280b3('bum): pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ kun snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rna
280b4('bum): yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu
280b5('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
280b6('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod de/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shos myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi ning po'i
280b7('bum): yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i lha rnams yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do/ bsam gten gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi
280b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do 'dus byas stong pa nyid yodade/ 
281a1('bum): phyi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams
281a2('bum): cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du yod/ 
281a3('bum): do/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do/ dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 
281a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ 'phags pa'i bde nu ba rnams yod de/ bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod
281a5('bum): de/ rnam par tha ra pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i sgo/ mas par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo ste/ nga ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod de/ mngon
281a6('bum): par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams
281a7('bum): yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras nu yong / lan cig phyir rang ba'i 'bras bu mad/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras du yod de/ dgra bcom pa zhing med / bya
281a8('bum): chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid khyong ngo / rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas
281b1('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par rdzog sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu gleng gi sems can nas
281b2('bum): lha zhog gi/ ke'u sha ka glang bzhi'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems
281b3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas
281b4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir
281b5('bum): na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dge yang dag pa'i sgom
281b6('bum): myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/ 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyu rang to// 'thob / 
281b7('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur ro// 'thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// dga' bcom pa nyid thobar gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis
281b8('bum): rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myang bar zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur/ 
282a1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u
282a2('bum): shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu/ phyi nad pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha roladu
282a3('bum): tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol dam tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid
282a4('bum): sras te/ dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma ba sa stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
282a5('bum): dang rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed
282a6('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i
282a7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas/ 
282a8('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
282b1('bum): dges sa su dang/ 'dugs pa zh-i/ mam na/ ma rgyas bya sa pa 'dres pa nga / rgyas rnye sa chen pa / dag pa chem
282b2('bum): bdang snyoms chen pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres du sa gzhan dag kyang rgya mir bstan te/ ke ru shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi sa no mang du phyin pa glegs
282b3('bum): rnam du dris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyin pa dang / de zas 'di ni bas rnams ches mang du 'del bar shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha ma
282b4('bum): phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing ma tho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gyi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yos
282b5('bum): deng rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mche ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// 
282b6('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams yad do/ tshangs ris kyi sku rnams yodade/ tshang lce nye pan gyi lha rnams yong do// mas su na 'khor gi lha rnams mdzad/ mas chen gyi lha rnams yo
282b7('bum): rna ba sti rnams 'dod/ rgyu nga gi snga rnams yodang / chang sa sna pa'i tha mas papa dang / kun 'i lha rnams dang / dge ba'i sa rnams mang/ rlung de'i rnarnams yo / tshang med dge
282b8('bum): mas padang / rgyas kyi rnams pang / che ba'i lhan pas medang/ mu'i'i sa rnas med de/ chang byeng ba'i rnarnams 'a // 'bras kyi 'i rnams pa // sa'i ma
283a1('bum): gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ rnam shes mtha'
283a2('bum): yas skye mched gi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye ba ched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes meng 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ 
283a3('bum): yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod de ka// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong
283a4('bum): pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'du sa byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// 
283a5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin skyong / pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan
283a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// 
283a7('bum): dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags
283a8('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par/ 
283b1('bum): 'jug pa dgu yod do/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gsheg/ 
283b2('bum): pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod de// 
283b3('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nang tu
283b4('bum): zhugs rtsa ba'i rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
283b5('bum): bri rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka grong rje na po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog
283b6('bum): ke tsu shig nga gi 'dis rten gyi khams bye chu'i sems can hrI dkyig 'ad pa de dag rigs kyi su'am rigs kyi bu mi la las / chu'i khams rab tu shodan/ ke'u shika de mam du se
284a1('bum): lter shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 
284a2('bum): 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyu rang to// 'thob bo 'thab par 'gyur ro/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
284a3('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo thob par
284a4('bum): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug gong 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
284a5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rolang
284a6('bum): tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang
284a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das
284a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
284b1('bum): gi sum / ga pa ma man ga nga nga / tshig pa dzin pa pa ni nga sam gtan zhe / chang bzhi dang/ ga zugs mye pa'i rnams par 'jug pa bzhi nga/ 
284b2('bum): sa brgya dang/ dz+ham kyis gas pa'i rnams par 'jug pa dgu / rnam pa sa pa'i stong pa nyid dang mtshanam myed pa dang / sman pa myed pa dang / mngon pa shis pa rnams dang / ting rje 'dzi rnams dang/ 
284b3('bum): kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi ji gas pa bani dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
284b4('bum): bo dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs/ rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 'amo gang gis
284b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar bya shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
284b6('bum): shes na kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mthe ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs cha ning mtho ba rnams med do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho
284b7('bum): rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ gzhan 'drus
285a1('bum): dang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye pan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do/ snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung
285a2('bum): snang gi lha rnams yid do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod de/ dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod de/ 
285a3('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yed // chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi yod do// shinang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod
285a4('bum): do/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam she/ sa mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched
285a5('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes med myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khri mas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
285a6('bum): yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
285a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa
285a8('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod
285b1('bum): dngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// spobs/ 
285b2('bum): rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i smos/ 
285b3('bum): par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa
285b4('bum): rnams yad do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pas yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod
285b5('bum): do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyunang tu zhugs pa 'i 'bras bu yod ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyi/ ra myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod ngo // rang byung
285b6('bum): chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenod pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i rnams yod do// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra' bcom pa rnams yod do// 
285b7('bum): rang byang chub yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod/ 
285b8('bum): ke'u shika stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thur bu lwa zhig gi/ ke'u shika stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu rtsi'am/ rigs kyi
