286a1('bum): bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang
286a2('bum): ngo bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gleg bam du bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ton
286a3('bum): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing
286a4('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs da par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhug ngas pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
286a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ 'thob pa ra 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i// 'bras bu thob par gyur da to// 'thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro// ngagra bcom pa nyid thob par gyu rad to// 
286a6('bum): 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems da
286a7('bum): skyon myeng par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs
286a8('bum): par sangs rgyas por 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang brtson
286b1('bum): nu kyi ma myi / nag ma ba / shes sa kyi ma na pa dang / sa nyidas nga pa nyi / phyin myong ba nyid dang / rlung pa nyid byung nyid / 
286b2('bum): byed shing / 'od mi sa myed pa nyid du dung rgyas thong nyi dang / dus su rgyas stong pa kyi nga / mtha' las 'das pa song sa ny-id nga/ 'gra ma nga sa ma myed nga ba nyid dang / dor ba myed pa chos da
286b3('bum): rang bzhin mang pa nyid nga/ chos thams cad stong ba nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi myigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngon nyid stong ba nyid dang / ngom pa myed pa'i bam
286b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya
286b5('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgya dang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnaM par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa
286b6('bum): dang / mngon par shes drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzung sa kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang // sangs
286b7('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka/ 
286b8('bum): rnam gras kyang shes kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu ma gang gis shes kyi pa nga myed pa sregs pa du rnaMs shing / bkrag pa dang / bringang // tan chub myong gan nga/ rlom nga ma 'i ma
287a1('bum): shes par shes pa sgyur/ 'i phyir zhen/ ke shig ni 'dis pashes rab kyi bang sbyin pa 'di las tshas thams cad kyi cher ldan te/ de dag yang ngas rgyas kyinas che zhing macwo rnams yongs
287a2('bum): na yo sa myong / lci dag gi na rnam da/ ni rigs kyi rnams yong/ mang sa gsus gi sbya ma mdang/ ma mas yo / 
287a3('bum): ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// 
287a4('bum): tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// rlung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams
287a5('bum): yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rna sa yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myang che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
287a6('bum): myi che ba'i lha sbed de/ smig+sa dung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ shinang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og sbyin gyi lha rnams yongad / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams lan
287a7('bum): hU~M rnam shes mthar las spyi mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myong 'du shes myed min skye mched kyi sa rnams yod do/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yong ngo do// tshul khris
287a8('bum): kyim khyid pa pang / yang pa'i ma du myed nga/ con 'grus kyi mu pa khyed pa mad/ yom gi dog pa me du/ kyi sa phyin po / ma
287b1('bum): yang / phyi stong pa nyid med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med do// chen po stong pa nyid yod de/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod de/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mthang/ 
287b2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa
287b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams
287b4('bum): yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa da yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams
287b5('bum): yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i
287b6('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs
287b7('bum): pa rnams yod do/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod ngo // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod // 
287b8('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ rgyund tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba nas/ 
288a1('bum): mang/ nga ma 'ang rnams padang / dag ma 'arnams sadang / rasas rgyas rnams mad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen rnamam padang / de ni dgashegs pa bam pas dag pa rjog
288a2('bum): me // / ga ngas kyi gag// / gsus ga nga rjen pol gi mas kyi sem da da pa dag gas kyi nu gas kyi
288a3('bum): 'ilas kyi sprum btsu shod ni// rgyu ni mapa du mems/ rigs kyi du ma rigs kyi me de 'i so ma pa rgyas ma du selalas/ gso dang/ bamam ldan 'as ma / bde gshegs
288a4('bum): mdzang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke ru shi ka da bas rigs kyi du'am/ rigs kyi bu ma gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bram du bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin dan/ 
288a5('bum): bsod nams tshes mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni // 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am
288a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur te/ 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po 'thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
288a7('bum): par te/ 'a 'dzin par gyu na// phyid ni ma'i dres ma par gyur te/ 'a ba 'ardzi par 'gyur ro// dgra com pa ning tho par gyur to/ 'do ro// 'do par 'gyur ro// rangs ma rgyas kyi na
288a8('bum): nams kyi kyang / rargyang nung so pa gyur tu/ 'di ba 'a la 'byor ro// phying nub mims dpa' sems dpa'i chen po mas tu byang chub sems pa'i phyid byed par zhugs par gyur ci/ dug go// duni
288b1('bum): 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe
288b2('bum): na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol

288b6('bum): pa lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha ra pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu dang / 
288b7('bum): rnam par tha ra pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
288b8('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos chad myed pa gzhan
289a1('bum): dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya
289a2('bum): ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod
289a3('bum): pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnam sa yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsuM
289a4('bum): gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// 
289a5('bum): tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod
289a6('bum): do kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// ngag rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod de/ chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myang che ba'i lha rnams yod/ 
289a7('bum): dza'abras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shind tu mthong bu'i lha rnams yod do/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha'
289a8('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed min skye mchod kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i// 
289b1('bum): pa'am byed sa rgya chub khrims kyi pa ra phyin pa yod / brjod pa'i pa'i lang phyin pa yang / con grus kyi pha rol sbyin pa ma dadu/ bsam gtan gi pa ma tsund pa yad / shes rab kyi
289b2('bum): rilang tu byin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod / phyi stong pa nyid yod/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod du/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod /

289b4('bum): do rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yo da do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnaMs

289b7('bum): kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'dug pa gu da/ rnam pa ma pa'i kyi dang pa nyi dang / mtshan sa skyed pa rlon pa rling yo / sod pa shes mas ma // 'i mas so / 
289b8('bum): ma med/ de zhi ga shegs pa mi ma / phyi ga sa ma ma yin pa gi 'as ma la'i
290a1('bum): 6/ yod do/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa

290a5('bum): sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams re'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ke'u shi
290a6('bum): ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir na
290a7('bum): nad ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myong pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhug par gyur/

290b8('bum): dang/ 'jug pa nga ba zhi nga / rdzu rdul gin so ni dag/ rang mi lda da/ ngas ldangang / rgya chub kyi yang ga tsun dang/ migs pa'i sa can pag sungs dang / mags pa'i sa / 
291a1('bum): ldum gang gis shes rab kyi pa ro mang tu phyin pa glegs pam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan gyi na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya/ domo phyir/ 
291a2('bum): zhend ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'a de las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtsho
291a3('bum): ba rnams yod do/ khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthong ba rnams yod do/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtsha ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan
291a4('bum): gi lha rnams yod de/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams song ngo // gzhan 'phrul dbang byang gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lnganye phan gi lha rnams yod // tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod/ 
291a5('bum): da/ ma mchen gi sun mas yod do// snang ba'i lharnamam 'a // rlung snang gi surnams mang/ tshang byed snang ba'i lha rnams song ngo / kun snang ba'i bla rnams mdzad/ dge' ba'i marnams song / rlung 'i
291b1('bum): rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi tsho ba'i lnga/ 
291b2('bum): rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shinang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched gi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes
291b3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myang 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol
291b4('bum): tu phyind pa yod do/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pa rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// / 
291b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dang ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas
291b6('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong
291b7('bum): pa nyid yod ngo do// myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yid do// ngo'i nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yong ngo // yang dag par spong
291b8('bum): ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams/ 
292a1('bum): yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug dgu yod do// 
292a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yod do// 
292a3('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
292a4('bum): yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa tha sa cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// 
292a5('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong nga'i rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang ngo // de bzhin gshes
292a6('bum): pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod de tshad myed pa
292a7('bum): bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u sha ka de ji snyam sas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol
292a8('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po 'di glegs bam du
292b1('bum): gyu / sa su rgyas y-i sa gyur te/ pa ma par gyung chu sems pa sems dpa chen pa rnam/ 
292b2('bum): sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug gor 'gyur ro/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par
292b3('bum): 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa skyed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
292b4('bum): pa rom du phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pa'i mang sbyin pa dang / bsam gtan ga pa ro la tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dang / dang stong pa nyid dang / skyo stong pa nyid dang / phyi na myong ba nyid dang / stong ba nyi
292b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong
293a1('bum): nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
293a2('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i la
293a3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa drag dang / rnam par tha rang po'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / 
293a4('bum): mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzung / sa kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs po bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang // sangs
293a5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po de ga ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher stan
293a6('bum): to/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi du 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs pan du skyes shing / bkrag po dang/ bri ba dang kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan byinan/ de bas 'di'i bsod / 
293a7('bum): mngadu 'phel bar shes pa rgyu'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mthor ba rnams yong ngo // 
293a8('bum): bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yong ngo // khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthor ba rnams yod / rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams med do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod ngo do// mche ma'i lha rnams yang ngo // 
293b1('bum): kyi lha rnams yod / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu nad pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha lang tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha'i lung tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod de/ bsam gtan na/ 
293b2('bum): pha ro mong tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don
293b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// 
294a1('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod ngo / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod / ngab nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ dam pa myed pa'i ngabazhis
294a2('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nyi bar gzhag pa rnams song // yang dag par spong ba rnams med/ rdzu phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod de/ stobs rnams yod // byang chub kyi yan lag rnam
294a3('bum): yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// 
294a4('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad yod / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms na par 'jug pa dgu yodado/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes
294a5('bum): rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzinang rnams yod ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnamasayod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod ngo do// myi 'jig pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stod do// 
294a6('bum): snying rje chen po yod do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yong / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongad ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid
294a7('bum): yod de/ rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med do/ rgyunang tu zhugs pa'i rnams yod do/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ phyir myi 'ong ba rnams sen
294a8('bum): do/ dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod / 
294b1('bum): ke'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka glang chen po bzhi'i 'jig gten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la raH/ 
294b2('bum): bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i
294b3('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab
294b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du klag pa dang / bri ba dang kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byind na bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
294b5('bum): pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag/ la slabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pI/ skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par
294b6('bum): 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'the ba bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ra gyur to// 'thab bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i
294b7('bum): 'bras bu thob par gyur te/ 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 
294b8('bum): 'thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myeng par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog
295a1('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgyan/ mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di
295a2('bum): lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha/ 
295a3('bum): ro lAng tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong
295a4('bum): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma du tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan
295a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po mye da pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par
295a6('bum): spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi gang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha ra pa
295a7('bum): brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug tang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
295a8('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
295b1('bum): zo dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs res kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
295b2('bum): karab gyi pha rolang tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni
295b3('bum): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi
295b4('bum): rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha
295b5('bum): rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnas yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gis/ 
295b6('bum): rnam ya / snang ba'i lha rnams med do/ chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lce rnams yong ngo // dge' ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// rlung dge'i lha rnams yang / 
295b7('bum): nang de dge pa rnams yod / dag rgyas kyi lha rnams yod // che ba rnams ma / rlung ci'i rnam pa mau du/ rtang byeng che ba'i snarnangs song ngo // 'bras bu 'i rnams ma / 
295b8('bum): ram 'dod/ byag duba'i mas ma // shin ba'i rna pa yod / ma nga/ ga kyi kyisam pa'i na masan
296a1('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yeng ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod
296a2('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
296a3('bum): pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 
296a4('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yo da // rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// 
296a5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
296a6('bum): yo / yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams dado// dbang po rnams yod do/ stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 
296b1('bum): rnams yod do// mI 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
296b2('bum): bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dga' bcom pa nyid yod de/ rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod de// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rjes
296b3('bum): 'dza / phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
296b4('bum): rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rtenang gi khams kyi sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la wa
296b5('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la ra/ ba tu bkod na/ ke'u she ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs/ 
296b6('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mngadu 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / 
296b7('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du kAg pa dang / bri ba dang kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol khyon/ 
296b8('bum): pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
297a1('bum): 'dras thu par byes te/ 'jam 'dzi par 'gyur ro/ lan cig phyir ba'i 'bras du ba par gyur du/ 'tsho 'job par 'gyur ra/ phyir mu 'ang ba'i shas bu thong gyur to// dag com pa 'id da pa gyu
297a2('bum): tad 'dzus po 'thos par 'gyur ro/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur te/ 'job ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa tsun
297a3('bum): pa'agyur te/ 'dug go// 'dug par 'gyur ro// blan sbed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par chang rgyas 'gyur ro// rkyen
297a4('bum): shi ka zag pa skyed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhen/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pa rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha ro la tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa dang / 
297a5('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha ro la tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong
297a6('bum): panyi dang/ 'dus byas slong sa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid nga/ mam las las pa stong pa nyid dang / rig sa dang ma myed pa song po nyid dang / der spong pa stong pa nyid du/ rang bzhin gyi nyid dang / chos thams cad spong ba nyi nga / 
297a7('bum): rang gi mtsha nyid sti ma nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / das pa med pa stong pa nyid dang / dbo nying stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa myed pa'i ba nyid dang pa nyid dang / dre bsheb gzhag sa ni dang / yang dag par spong ba ba nong / 
297a8('bum): 'bru gi nang pa ni nga / dbang dang / stongs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam san lag brkyang pa dang / 'bags pa'i den pa bzhi dang / rnam par bdapa brgya dang / mabarang kyis gnas pa'i sems ci/ 
297b1('bum): 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rta mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jig
297b2('bum): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa
297b3('bum): gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstanang to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas
297b4('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnas
297b5('bum): yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag/ gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do/ mtsha
297b6('bum): ma'i lha rnams yang // dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lhan mos yod/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ tshangs ris kye+e lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye ban gi lha rnams yid do/ tshangs pa kun
297b7('bum): 'khor gi snga rnams yod de/ ches chen gi sbyi rnams yod de/ snang ba'i lha rnams mdza / nub ga lha rnams mdzo // chang myed snang ba'i lharnams yod / kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yong ngo / dge ba'i lha rnams yong/ 
297b8('bum): nga cu ga'i rnarnams pad / chang byed dag pa'i rnarnams pa // das rgyas kyi rnams de/ 'i rnarnamapa po ngo// rlung ci'i lharnams yod / chang byeng mi'i rnarnam pa ma nga/ 'bras bu mi rnamasas
298a1('bum): du du ma / dru byed me ma pa yod // 'dugs bye du ni myed phyi skye med kyi ma mdang/ skye ma phyi pa
298a2('bum): ma de pa sa ra/ thong pa pa'i ming du na pa yod / brtson 'grus kyi rolang tu phyin pa yod do/ bsam gta gi pa mang phyin pa yod do/ shes rab kyi pha ni lang tu phyin pa yod do/ nang byung ba nyid yong / 
298a3('bum): stong pa nyid yo dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid yong ngo / stong pa nyid stong nyid yod do// chen po stong ba nyid yod do/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi du/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod de/ mtham
298a4('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
298a5('bum): yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnaMs/ 
298a6('bum): madrod/ dbang po rnams yo da/ stobs rnams yod de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod/ bsam gtan rnams yang ngo / 
298a7('bum): chad byed pa rnams yadang / gzugs skyed pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa rnams yid de/ rnam par thar pa brgyad mod nga/ bab kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mo nga / rnam par tha ra pa'i sgra stong pa nyid nga mtshan/ 
298b1('bum): ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzind rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par
298b2('bum): rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhug pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid
298b3('bum): yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra
298b4('bum): bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes yod do// / 
298b5('bum): bam po / ke'u shi ka stong gi 'jig rten dag khams kyi sems can rnaMs lta zhog gi/ ke'u shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gi khams 'bring po'i sas
298b6('bum): can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka/ 
298b7('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ ke'u
298b8('bum): shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel l-i/ de ci'i phyin
299a1('bum): ne don gas kyi ma pa rgyan pa 'dings pag skye rnams kyi che de/ dadag nga sa kyi sgyu ma rigs kyi ma dag ya ga pa spyod bye zhugs
299a2('bum): ga / rgyud tu zhugs pa 'i sa du gyu / / kyis kyi ma pa'i sa pa gyu / lam la ma gyu ro/ 
299a3('bum): ba'i 'bras du theb par gyur to/ 'job po 'ang par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid byed par gyur to/ 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis 'a byang nub thob par gyur to// 'dzin po
299a4('bum): bar 'gyur ro/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyurang te 'ju gra go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yadag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
299a5('bum): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul
299a6('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / 
299a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang // phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus rgyas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mthar las 'das pa stong ba nyid / 
299a8('bum): thog ma dang sa ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong
299b1('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phru la gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
299b2('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
299b3('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
299b4('bum): pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byam sa pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya
299b5('bum): cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gleg bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin
299b6('bum): na de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rig che zhing mtho' ba rnaMs
299b7('bum): yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtha' ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho' bo rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnaMs/ 
299b8('bum): yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor/ 
300a1('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad mad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams
300a2('bum): yod do/ chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// ngag rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// tsha ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i
300a3('bum): lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shinang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
300a4('bum): mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes med myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i
300a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinod pa
300a6('bum): yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
300a7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// 
300a8('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod de/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yong
300b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ya dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
300b2('bum): lag brgyang rjod / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ bsam gtan rnams med de/ tshang myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod / rnam par thar pa brgyad yod ngo // mthar kyis
300b3('bum): gnas pa'i skams par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa drug yod do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do dang / 
300b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod ngo do// snying rje chen po yod do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu
300b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rna la thos
300b6('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun ba tu zhugs pa rnams yad // cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra' bcom pa rnams yod de/ rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub ses
300b7('bum): das mim pa rkyen / de shi ga shegs pa dgrar mom ya ga pa rdzogs pakyis sa sa rnams pa s+ho// su shig slong nyi nga da shi na pa'i se ma can
300b8('bum): nanag/ ke su ni ga stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams kyi sems ca ni snyed pa de dag gas kyi yu'am rigs kyi bu ma mams thasam gtan nis tsu dod/ ma sring ba bani du/ gzugs
301a1('bum): mas / sa sas shA jug / keseM/ do myu / sa ma sa kyi ma sa tshus dang su e / ga
301a2('bum): shegs pa / lam na mes kyis pa/ stsa gyi/ tsun du sa kyi bu ma rigs kyi rdum gang gis shes ras kyi ma phyin pa di glegs pa
301a3('bum): ga na/ yang ra sa ma du / tsod phyi nan/ du 'i la kyi sa da pa 'dems pagapa kyi 'i kyis rnams rgya da
301a4('bum): de dag las bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug gol drug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 
301a5('bum): 'thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dag
301a6('bum): bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyu rang ngo // 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
301a7('bum): po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs
301a8('bum): parar gyu rgyaro// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams gdu zhe ni/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i bar byad du phyinang po dang / tshul khrims kyi pha ngom pa tu myin pa dang / bzong
301b1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
301b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
301b3('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos
301b4('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags
301b5('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bani dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid da
301b6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
301b7('bum): par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher
301b8('bum): bstand to/ ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na de bas 'da'i
302a1('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho'o ba rno/ 
302a2('bum): yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen rigs bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtsha ma'i lha rnams yod do// 
302a3('bum): dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lce nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// 
302a4('bum): tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do/ snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha/ rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba/ 'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rje yod/ 
302a5('bum): tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dag rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yid do// 
302a6('bum): myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched gyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye rnyed kyi ldan
302a7('bum): mo dza/ cung zed myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
302a8('bum): yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod de/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// 
302b1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed/ 
302b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// / 
302b3('bum): ngobo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnaMs
302b4('bum): yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i
302b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mtha/ rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do// 
302b6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnaMs yod do// 
302b7('bum): yadado/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams kyi
303a1('bum): sa rgyas dngos 'dzid/ byang rlung sems dpa sems dpa chen pa rnams yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dga' mam pa snang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas rnams mdang / / 
303a2('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rte ga khams gang ga'i klung gi khyim snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi du mo la las thasam gtan ba ni la bgod de/ chang byed pa 'ani dang / gzugs byed pa'i sems par
303a3('bum): 'dug pa bani dang / mngon par shes pa lnga sa rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shrI ka de ji snyadam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang
303a4('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang skye pa/ kri'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa dang / 
303a5('bum): bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya
303a6('bum): cher brtan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'dus bu thob par gyur
303a7('bum): lar gyur ro// mang cig kyi pa'i lus su / yir 'gyur ro// myi ba'i lus sum pa gyu te/ tha~M bas su / 
303a8('bum): gyur ro/ la tu // rgyas kyi ga sa kyi su chu la gyu sa// tsham la tu ma/ byang chu sem pa ma
303b1('bum): po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs
303b2('bum): 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byind pa dang / bzod
303b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid
303b4('bum): dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stongar pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma
303b5('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa/ 
303b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang / 
303b7('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad po'i
303b8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
304a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan
304a2('bum): ngag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnams grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas
304a3('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mthong ba rnams yod de// bram ze'i
304a4('bum): rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnaMs yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnaMs
304a5('bum): yod do// gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ tshangs ris kyi/ lha rnams yod do/ tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tsha/ ngas pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do/ tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// 
304a6('bum): snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed sna nga ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ dge' ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad meng dge ba'i lha
304a7('bum): rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod/ 
304a8('bum): do/ shinang du mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod de/ 'og myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ cung
304b1('bum): zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// / 
304b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa
304b3('bum): nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa
304b4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad s+ho/ dpa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs dpa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa
304b5('bum): nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnaMs
304b6('bum): yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod de/ tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
304b7('bum): pa rnams yod de/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myeng pa yod do/ mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// 
304b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos
305a1('bum): ngam 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid
305a2('bum): yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yang do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems
305a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji srid pa de dag rig
305a4('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de tshad myed pa/ bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mdo/ na par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems na rigs
305a5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
305a6('bum): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi
305a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa 'di zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la slabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhug/ 
305a8('bum): pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te/ 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs
305b1('bum): rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go// 
305b2('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa
305b3('bum): pha ral tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
305b4('bum): kha dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / ma
305b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos/ thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs/ 
305b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / 
305b7('bum): dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa drug
305b8('bum): dang / rnam par sar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi skabs cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs / 
306a1('bum): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos med pa
306a2('bum): gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs ngas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas
306a3('bum): 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya tshor bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba rjes
306a4('bum): yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rdzas yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod/ 
306a5('bum): ngo// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phral dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnaMs yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha
306a6('bum): rnams yod do// changs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshang ming snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod ngo do// dge' ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha tsA
306a7('bum): yong ngo // tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lce rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che bu'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod / myi che ba'i lha rnams yong ro
306a8('bum): myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shind tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nam snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi/ 
306b1('bum): lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol
306b2('bum): tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// 
306b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
306b4('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa/ nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa/ 
306b5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo ma nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// 
306b6('bum): dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa
306b7('bum): rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed
306b8('bum): pa dang smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang
307a1('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
307a2('bum): ma nga/ dgra batshim pa nyid yod do// nga byang chub 'ang / las kyi rnam pa shes ma 'ing ma dang / rnam pa thams cad sa khyen pa nyid mong // rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams mdado/ yon cig phyir 'ang ba rnams 'dzad/ phyir myi 'ong ba rnams
307a3('bum): mang/ dgra rgyas pa rnams yong / rangasas rgyas rnams yod do/ drang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// keru
307a4('bum): shi ka nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod na/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i
307a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod ni/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi du mo/ de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mdu 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom
307a6('bum): ldan 'das yang / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal drub/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gos shes rab kyi pha rol kyi phyind pa'idi glegs pam du byas nas bklag pa
307a7('bum): khril dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byinan/ bsod nams ces mang du 'brel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dri las zag pa skyed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te
307a8('bum): de dag la srabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur te/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyuraro// 
307b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyu ra to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur/ 
307b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur te/ 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myang bar zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 
307b3('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ra ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa
307b4('bum): myong pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa/ de'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / 
307b5('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyi nad pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang ste pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / 
307b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
307b7('bum): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
307b8('bum): dang yang dag par spong po bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par
307b9('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 
308a1('bum): tha ra pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams deng / 
308a2('bum): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 
308a3('bum): dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
308a4('bum): pa glegs bam bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu byad ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du 'phye dal bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
308a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thas cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do/ khyim bdag gi rig
308a6('bum): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe' ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan
308a7('bum): 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshungs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lce nya phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang
308a8('bum): gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myang snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams
308b1('bum): che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod // 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod de/ myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
308b2('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// ldog myin gi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad mung ba'i skye mched kyi lha rnams song/ 
308b3('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinapa
308b4('bum): ba yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po
308b5('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa/ nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las/ 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
308b6('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thos cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid da do// myi dmyig pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid
308b7('bum): stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod/ 
308b8('bum): do/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
309a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes
309a2('bum): pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// 
309a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam
309a4('bum): gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'od ra ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnaMs yod/ 
309a5('bum): dza/ rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka byang
309a6('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
309a7('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rags kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mngango // bde bar gshegs pa
309a8('bum): mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa 'di glegs bam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na
309b1('bum): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi/ 
309b2('bum): bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyu rad to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
309b3('bum): thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thab bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi
309b4('bum): theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub sems dpa' thob par gyur to// 2thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyurapa/ 
309b5('bum): to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang /
