309b6('bum): rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myang pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson
309b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong / 
309b8('bum): pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha myong ba stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
310a1('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i du ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran
310a2('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / 
310a3('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
310a4('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'ja dgas pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgya das kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen
310a5('bum): po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis kyang shes
310a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar
310a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod
310a8('bum): ngong rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod
310b1('bum): tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha
310b2('bum): rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// 
310b3('bum): tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gi lha rnas
310b4('bum): yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam ra shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi/ 
310b5('bum): rnams yod do// bam po// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha lang tu phyin pa yod/ 
310b6('bum): re brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi ba ro lang tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod / phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong
310b7('bum): pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor
310b8('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod de/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
311a1('bum): yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnaMs
311a2('bum): yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad med pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
311a3('bum): par 'jug pa yod do// rnam par tha dad pa brgyad yod do// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa drag yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa
311a4('bum): rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po
311a5('bum): yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhu/ gas pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yo// da do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod
311a6('bum): rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom
311a7('bum): pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka byang
311a8('bum): shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo las bsam gtan bzhi pa la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
311b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
311b2('bum): 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u sha ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang
311b3('bum): bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa med pa rnams rgya cher bstand te/ de dag la
311b4('bum): bsrabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyonang myed par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par
311b5('bum): 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyu ra to// 'thobabo/ thob par 'gyur ro/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyu/ rang to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro/ dgra' bcom pa nyid thob
311b6('bum): par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob para'i gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang / 
311b7('bum): chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// 
311b8('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu
312a1('bum): phyind pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
312a2('bum): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / 
312a3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
312a4('bum): dram pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu'/ phral gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / bya/ nga chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
312a5('bum): pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad pa dang / 'phags kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam pa rang tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa dang / 
312a6('bum): mngon par shes drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas
312a7('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grag
312a8('bum): des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs ma du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams mang du 'phel bar shes
312b1('bum): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstand te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// 'bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho' ba
312b2('bum): rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// rgyal tshon bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 
312b3('bum): 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams
312b4('bum): yang da/ snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad mad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dga'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha
312b5('bum): rnams yod de/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshang meng che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod ngo // myi
312b6('bum): gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myo na gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas spyi mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas
312b7('bum): skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed min skye mchod kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// 
312b8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rolang tu phyin pa yod de/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stos
313a1('bum): pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod/ 
313a2('bum): do thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// 
313a3('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod
313a4('bum): dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ nga 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// 
313a5('bum): tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa drug yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong
313a6('bum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa
313a7('bum): rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi
313a8('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnaMs/ 
313b1('bum): yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra' bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
313b2('bum): rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka shA phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs
313b3('bum): myong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mdog par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kai'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
313b4('bum): 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam klag pa dang / 
313b5('bum): bri la dang / kha ton tu du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams che/ sa mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u de ni 'di ltar shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'od las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher
313b6('bum): bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu me ngag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'jog
313b7('bum): 'thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par/ 
313b8('bum): gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpas
314a1('bum): skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzog
314a2('bum): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nga tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus
314a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don
314a4('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / 
314a5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo/ nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag
314a6('bum): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / 
314a7('bum): rnam par thar par brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myang ba dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs
314a8('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'dzegs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba
314b1('bum): chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam
314b2('bum): du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka re ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa 'di las chos
314b3('bum): thams cad rgya cher bstan te de dag yod dag pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams/ 
314b4('bum): yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnaMs/ yod do// dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lhade rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs
314b5('bum): ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs sal kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yongasasnang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myang snang
314b6('bum): ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod de/ che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha
314b7('bum): rnams yod do// tshad myad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// ma che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shrI nang tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 
314b8('bum): 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnam yod do// 'du shes myang 'du shes myang
315a1('bum): myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// 
315a2('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// 
315a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus mi byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang
315a4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed
315a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnamasayod do// yang dag par spor ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkeng / pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// 
315a6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yang tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rna
315a7('bum): yod de/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod / rnam par tharang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ mngon par shes pa rnams yong // 
315a8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzus kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod ngo / snying rje chen po yod do/ sangs
315b1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam
315b2('bum): pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i rnams yod do// dga' bcom pa rnams yod do// rang
315b3('bum): sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
315b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam dgatan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i
315b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu/ bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsolapa/ 
315b6('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di'i glegs bam
315b7('bum): bklag pa dang / bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i/ 
315b8('bum): chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myang ba ro zhags par gyur to/ 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob
316a1('bum): par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur du to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyuraro// 
316a2('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
316a3('bum): rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur du te/ 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par
316a4('bum): 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ka'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind/ 
316a5('bum): pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid
316a6('bum): dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed
316a7('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid
316a8('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
316b1('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med
316b2('bum): pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
316b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang cher bstand to// ke'u shi ka
316b4('bum): rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod na
316b5('bum): ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las cho// sa thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che
316b6('bum): zhing mtho' ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mthong ba rnams yod do// khrim bdag gi rigs che zhing mthong ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams
316b7('bum): yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phral dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phral dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnas
316b8('bum): yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod // chung snang gi lha rnams yod de/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams stong ngo // dge' ba'i lha rnams yong
317a1('bum): chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras
317a2('bum): bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shi nad tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha'/ 
317a3('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yid do// 'du shes myed 'du shes med myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 
317a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod
317a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi/ stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong / pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid
317a6('bum): yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyidayod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tham myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa sto/ ra pa nyid yod do// 
317a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos
317a8('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang
317b1('bum): chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// che dang myong ba rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
317b2('bum): 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha ra pa brgyad yod do// mthe rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon
317b3('bum): par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// 
317b4('bum): snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod de/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyis
317b5('bum): yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnam sa yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba
317b6('bum): rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
317b7('bum): rgyas rnams yod do/ ke'u shi ka nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / 
317b8('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam
318a1('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di gleg/ 
318a2('bum): bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnas
318a3('bum): rgya cher bstan to// de dag la skabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 
318a4('bum): 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob pa/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid
318a5('bum): thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi// thag pa pa rnams kyi rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ 
318a6('bum): kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to/ 'jug go// 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
318a7('bum): rgya'o mngon par rdzogs par 'tshong rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
318a8('bum): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtanag pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 
318b1('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / 
318b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
318b3('bum): nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phagras pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
318b4('bum): pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par nga tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / 
318b5('bum): mngon par shes pa drug drang / ting nge 'dzin pa thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs
318b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dag de btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstand to// ke'u ni
318b7('bum): ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing / bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches
318b8('bum): mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ bram
319a1('bum): ga rigs chen tsha rnams pang / khyim pa g+sa seMs pa rnams / chen mau sU rnam pang/ sus su su sems nga/ 
319a2('bum): ni rnan pa/ 'i rnam sa/ gnan yu nga/ kyi rnams dang / sa
319a3('bum): kyi rnam ma / na/ rnamam dang / rdzu ma mas pa narnams du/ pa'i ma du/ du/ ge ma / 
319b1('bum): pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa
319b2('bum): nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
319b3('bum): yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phag
319b4('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rna ngas yod do/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i
319b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnas
319b6('bum): yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mya 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres rnams yod do// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i
319b7('bum): 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid yod do// 
319b8('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yid do// dag bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// 
320a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am
320a2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rig
320a3('bum): kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka da bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ga
320a4('bum): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches dmang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka do na 'di ltar shes
320a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bsta nad te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dgayang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug
320a6('bum): par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur/ 
320a7('bum): to/ 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur ro// 'thob bo thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
320a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myang par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon pa
320b1('bum): rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bzod
320b2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa
320b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
320b4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
320b5('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang / dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phag
320b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / nam par thar pa brgyad dang / mtha ro kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par jug pa dgu dang / rnam par ba ring pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma mye
320b7('bum): pa dang smon pa myed pa dang mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs/ 
320b8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / bdang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad myed pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// ke'u shi ka rnam grangs des
321a1('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu'ang rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs pam du dris shing / bklag pa dang bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams chesum du
321a2('bum): 'brel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha re lang tu phyin pa 'di la/ sa rgyas thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram
321a3('bum): ze'i rigs che zhing mtha' ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// 
321a4('bum): dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phral dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye pan gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams
321a5('bum): yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// chung / 
321a6('bum): dge'i lha rnams yong ngo / tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dege rgyas kyi lce rnams yod de/ che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ 'bras bu che po
321a7('bum): rnams yod do// myim pa'i su rnams mdzad// mo gdung ba'i lha rnams yong / shinang tu mthong ba'i lha rnaMs mang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og sbyin gyi lha rnams yod do/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mtshom
321a8('bum): kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myod pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myan skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
321b1('bum): yang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu byin pa yod do/ bzong pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa yod/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du da pa yod do/ bsam gzhang kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yod do// 
321b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid yod do/ phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yong de/ chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus mo byas stong ba/ 
321b3('bum): yodade/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
321b4('bum): yod do myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid/ yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa/ de nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par
321b5('bum): spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po rnams me / stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 2pags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa
321b6('bum): rnas yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad myed pa rnams yod do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu yod
321b7('bum): de rnam par tha ra ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smin pa myed pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rjes yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sos
321b8('bum): kyi 'jigs pa ma ma / zab na sargyas sa / na pa mang/ sam rgyas kyi ma mas ca mad/ rkyen tu zhugs pa'i 'drus chus / mchin phyi me 'i
322a1('bum): ra kyi tshul tsham rdzas nu dang / tham ma nying ma dang / snru naT nga/ mgrinam pashe tshang dang / ram bamamasaca mkhyed pa nyid dang / rgyun tuthugs nas 'dang / cig rgyas / 
322a2('bum): yong // phyir myi 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rjes yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya/ 
322a3('bum): rnams yod do// ke'u shi ka steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la rab tu bkod de/ tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs
322a4('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsolang pa bcom ldan
322a5('bum): 'das mang ngo / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di glegs bam bklag pa dang / 
322a6('bum): dri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'od las zag pa myed pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs
322a7('bum): shing rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon myed par zhugs par gyur to 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir
322a8('bum): 'ong na'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab par gyur te/ 'breb po/ thob par 'gyur ro/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
322b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob blo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myong bar zhugs par gyur to// 'dug
322b2('bum): 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka zag pa myed
322b3('bum): pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan
322b4('bum): gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
322b5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
322b6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa pa nyid dang / dran pa nyes sa nani
322b7('bum): ba bzhi dang / yang dag parjo bani dang/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / rabang po lnga dang / stongs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhid/ 
322b8('bum): rnam par thar pa brgya dang / mtha kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgung/ rnam pa sa rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rkye 'dzin thams ca ga/ 
323a1('bum): gsus kyi semams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnangs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa ni dang/ sas yang dag par rig pa padi nga/ sas rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pas rgyu dung/ rnams pa chen bu dang / rkyes
323a2('bum): dang / dga' bachen pa dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad meng pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bsnyun gyi// ke'u shi krarnamags des kyang rigs kyi bu ma rigs kyi bu mi gang gros shes rab kyi mi mang na
323a3('bum): baglegs pam du bris shing / daklag pa dang / drib dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byinan/ de bas 'di ba ba nams chos mang du 'phel bar shes par byer// de ci'i phyir rkyen/ ke'u shi ka ni 'di sar shes rab kyi ma na
323a4('bum): 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ngos kyi lha
323a5('bum): rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsugi lA rdzas yod do/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod/ ste dga' ldan gi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ gzhan 'phrul dab byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnaMs
323a6('bum): yod do// tshangs lha nya phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// chung snang gi lha rnaMs yod do// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rjes yod do// kun
323a7('bum): snang dang ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// dge ba'i lha rnaMs yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed dga' ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad myed che ba'i lha
323a8('bum): rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rjes yod do// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shinang tu mthong ba'i lha rnas yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og myin gyi lha rnams yod do// mam mkha'
323b1('bum): mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol
323b2('bum): tu phyind pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yod do// bsam gtan gi pha rol pa tu phyind pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
323b3('bum): yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi ning stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
323b4('bum): yod do mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa/ nyid yod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa/ nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan
323b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid yod do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag / 
323b6('bum): par spong ba rnaMs yod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs yod do// 
323b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams yod do// chang myang pa rnams yod do// gzugs medang pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod do// rnam par tha rad pa'i
323b8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod do/ mngon par shes pa rnaMs yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs rnams yod de/ myi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// 
324a1('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad
324a2('bum): yod do// rgyu na tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod de/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// 
324a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid yod de/ rang byang chub yod do/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mod
324a4('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// daphyir myi 'ong ba rnams
324a5('bum): yod do// dga' ba com pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa'
324a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
